author: ['Mike Henson']
title_src: England v Scotland: How Women's Rugby World Cup quarter-final could renew old rivalry
text_src: To get an idea of how long ago Scotland last beat England, read a Scotland on Sunday column that appeared the same year. "It hardly seems sensible for girls to want to take part in this particularly brutal contact sport," wrote celebrated journalist Jack McLean. "Why girls of teenage years wish to eschew such adolescent delights as make-up, nice clothes, elaborate hair-dos and mooning about after boys of a Saturday afternoon in favour of brawling in the glaur of a wet Scottish playing field in the winter is beyond me." And he was one of women's rugby's more supportive observers at the time. Not quite the Stone Age, but we are now more than a quarter of a century distant from Scotland's last success over their neighbours. Scotland edged to an 8-5 victory in the 1998 Home Nations - a precursor to the Women's Six Nations - and then took a 15-13 win in a third-place play-off at the European Championship in Italy a year later. Donna Kennedy, Scotland's most capped player, played in both. "We were a very good, strong side at that time," she told BBC Sport. "But we were still always the underdogs, because England have always been good at what they do. Even back then they were the team to beat. "That game in 1999 - up a mountain in Italy - was really tight. "It was very much an up-front battle in the forwards. I can remember it being quite a feisty game. "The game has changed now, but back then you could still put a boot on and ruck someone out."
summary_src:
Scotland's women's rugby team has not defeated England in over a quarter of a century, with their last successes against their neighbours dating back to the late 1990s. While the Scottish men's team secured a 2-1 Six Nations victory in November 2010, the drought for the women's side is significantly longer.

The early days of women's rugby faced considerable societal skepticism. Celebrated journalist Jack McLean, despite being considered one of the more supportive observers in the 1990s, notably questioned the "sensible[ness]" of girls participating in the "brutal contact sport," expressing bewilderment as to why they would prefer "brawling in the glaur" over "adolescent delights" like make-up and dating. Indeed, contact rugby for girls faced restrictions in the UK after its introduction in the 1970s.

Scotland's last victories against England were an 8-5 win in the 1998 Home Nations (a precursor to the Women's Six Nations) and a tight 15-13 third-place play-off victory at the European Championship a year later. Both historic matches featured Donna Kennedy, Scotland's most capped player, who described her side as "very good, strong" yet "always the underdogs" against a consistently dominant England. The 1999 encounter, played "up a mountain in Italy," was recalled as a "feisty" and "up-front battle in the forwards," with players noting the more physical rules of the era, such as being able to "put a boot on and ruck someone out." These wins represent a bygone era for Scottish women's rugby, highlighting the enduring challenge of overcoming their English rivals.
summary_tgt:
स्कॉटलैंड की महिला रग्बी टीम ने एक चौथाई सदी से भी अधिक समय से इंग्लैंड को नहीं हराया है, उनकी पड़ोसियों के खिलाफ आखिरी जीत 1990 के दशक के अंत में दर्ज की गई थी। जहाँ स्कॉटलैंड की पुरुष टीम ने नवंबर 2010 में सिक्स नेशंस में 2-1 से जीत हासिल की थी, वहीं महिला टीम के लिए यह सूखा काफी लंबा है।

महिला रग्बी के शुरुआती दिनों में काफी सामाजिक संदेह का सामना करना पड़ा था। प्रसिद्ध पत्रकार जैक मैकलीन, जिन्हें 1990 के दशक में अधिक सहायक पर्यवेक्षकों में से एक माना जाता था, ने भी लड़कियों के "क्रूर संपर्क खेल" में भाग लेने की "समझदारी" पर सवाल उठाया था, यह व्यक्त करते हुए कि उन्हें मेकअप और डेटिंग जैसे "किशोरावस्था के सुखों" के बजाय "कीचड़ में झगड़ना" क्यों पसंद होगा। वास्तव में, 1970 के दशक में लड़कियों के लिए संपर्क रग्बी की शुरुआत के बाद यूके में इस पर प्रतिबंध लगा दिए गए थे।

इंग्लैंड के खिलाफ स्कॉटलैंड की आखिरी जीत 1998 के होम नेशंस (महिला सिक्स नेशंस का अग्रदूत) में 8-5 की जीत और एक साल बाद यूरोपीय चैंपियनशिप में 15-13 से तीसरा स्थान प्ले-ऑफ की कड़ामुकाबला जीत थी। दोनों ऐतिहासिक मैचों में स्कॉटलैंड की सबसे अधिक कैप वाली खिलाड़ी डोना कैनेडी शामिल थीं, जिन्होंने अपनी टीम को "बहुत अच्छी, मजबूत" बताया, फिर भी लगातार हावी इंग्लैंड के सामने वे "हमेशा कमजोर" थीं। 1999 की वह भिड़ंत, जो "इटली के एक पहाड़ पर" खेली गई थी, को "उत्साहपूर्ण" और "फॉरवर्ड्स में सीधा मुकाबला" याद किया जाता है, जिसमें खिलाड़ियों ने उस युग के अधिक शारीरिक नियमों का उल्लेख किया, जैसे कि "किसी को हटाने के लिए बूट का इस्तेमाल करना और रकिंग करना"। ये जीतें स्कॉटिश महिला रग्बी के लिए एक बीते हुए युग का प्रतिनिधित्व करती हैं, जो उनके अंग्रेजी प्रतिद्वंद्वियों पर काबू पाने की निरंतर चुनौती को उजागर करती हैं।
meta_description: England have not lost to Scotland this millennium. But Donna Kennedy, among the last Scots to beat England, says the current crop will believe they can oust the World Cup hosts.

title_src: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Only The Poets frontman Tommy Longhurst
text_src: The 197th Manchester derby takes place at Etihad Stadium on Sunday, but will it be the Blues or the Reds who claim the points - and local bragging rights? "This is so hard to call, for many reasons," said BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton. "Manchester United could be buoyed by their win over Burnley before the international break, but I actually have bigger doubts about what we will see from Manchester City after seeing them capitulate the way they did against Brighton." Sutton is making predictions for all 380 Premier League games this season, against AI, BBC Sport readers and a variety of guests. For week four, he takes on Only The Poets frontman Tommy Longhurst. The Reading band are charging £1 a ticket when they play the O2 Academy Brixton, in February 2026. The gig takes place a few days after the release of their debut album, And I'd Do It Again. Do you agree with their scores? You can make your own predictions below. The most popular scoreline selected for each game is used in the scoreboards and tables at the bottom of this page. A correct result (picking a win, draw or defeat) is worth 10 points. The exact score earns 40 points.
summary_src: The 197th Manchester derby will take place this Sunday at Etihad Stadium. BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton describes the match as "so hard to call," noting that Manchester United could be boosted by their recent win, while he has "bigger doubts" about Manchester City after their performance against Brighton. Sutton's derby prediction is part of his season-long challenge to predict all 380 Premier League games against AI, BBC Sport readers, and weekly guests like Only The Poets frontman Tommy Longhurst. Readers are encouraged to make their own predictions and share their thoughts, with a scoring system awarding points for correct results and exact scores.

यहां अंग्रेजी समाचार सारांश का हिंदी अनुवाद दिया गया है:

**मैनचेस्टर डर्बी: 197वां मुकाबला, सटन की भविष्यवाणी और सीजन-लॉन्ग चुनौती**

197वां मैनचेस्टर डर्बी इस रविवार को एतिहाद स्टेडियम में खेला जाएगा। बीबीसी स्पोर्ट के फुटबॉल विशेषज्ञ क्रिस सटन ने इस मैच को "भविष्यवाणी करना बहुत मुश्किल" बताया है। उनका कहना है कि मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड को अपनी हालिया जीत से बढ़ावा मिल सकता है, जबकि ब्राइटन के खिलाफ मैनचेस्टर सिटी के प्रदर्शन के बाद उन्हें टीम को लेकर "बड़ी आशंकाएं" हैं।

सटन की डर्बी भविष्यवाणी उनकी उस पूरे सीज़न की चुनौती का हिस्सा है जिसमें वह एआई (AI), बीबीसी स्पोर्ट के पाठकों और 'ओनली द पोएट्स' के फ्रंटमैन टॉमी लॉन्गहर्स्ट जैसे साप्ताहिक मेहमानों के खिलाफ सभी 380 प्रीमियर लीग खेलों की भविष्यवाणी करते हैं।

पाठकों को अपनी भविष्यवाणियां करने और अपने विचार साझा करने के लिए प्रोत्साहित किया जाता है, जिसमें एक स्कोरिंग प्रणाली सही परिणामों और सटीक स्कोर के लिए अंक प्रदान करती है।

title_src: World Athletics Championships 2025: Great Britain miss out on first medal in mixed 4x400m relay
text_src: Great Britain were unable to extend their run of global relay medals as the mixed 4x400m team fell short of a podium place on the opening night of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo. Team GB made the podium in every relay event at the Paris 2024 Olympics, supplying five of the nation's 10 athletics medals at last summer's Games. That came after four relay medals were won at the previous World Championships two years ago, which included silver for the mixed 4x400m quartet on that occasion. In Saturday's earlier session in Japan, the British squad had qualified for the final with the second-fastest time but Lewis Davey, Emily Newnham, Toby Harries and Nicole Yeargin finished fifth in the medal race, just 0.23 seconds shy of the podium in a close finish behind runaway winners the United States. Team USA equalled the championship record in three minutes 08.80 seconds to take gold, with the Netherlands - anchored by hurdles star Femke Bol - and Belgium completing the podium. "Great Britain will obviously come away disappointed. We perhaps hoped they might have been a little bit more in the mix than they were," four-time global heptathlon champion Jessica Ennis-Hill said on BBC One. "Overall it was a very tough race. The Netherlands and United States were so far ahead. They were fantastic and there were some huge times ran there, so it was always going to be difficult. "I do feel there is some disappointment there for Great Britain, they could've performed slightly better." Reflecting on his third leg, Harries said: "I had a lot of work to do. We're here to win medals, we're GB, we're not here to just compete. "I went out as hard as I could to try and hold it. I just didn't have that endgame." Yeargin added: "I should have trusted myself and overtaken [Bol] when I could. I almost tripped her, we clashed spikes. "I hope we do better in the men's and women's relays."
summary_src:
Great Britain's mixed 4x400m relay team finished a disappointing fifth at the opening night of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo, failing to secure a podium place. This result ended their consistent run of global relay medals, which included podium finishes in every relay at the Paris 2024 Olympics (contributing five of the nation's 10 athletics medals) and a silver for the mixed quartet at the previous World Championships.

Despite qualifying for the final with the second-fastest time, the British squad of Lewis Davey, Emily Newnham, Toby Harries, and Nicole Yeargin couldn't challenge the leaders. Team USA equalled the championship record in 3:08.80, with the Netherlands (anchored by Femke Bol) and Belgium taking silver and bronze respectively.

Jessica Ennis-Hill and Roy Hodgson reflected the general disappointment, noting the team's potential for a better performance. Toby Harries acknowledged a challenging third leg, while Nicole Yeargin expressed regret over not overtaking Femke Bol when she had the chance, citing a clash of spikes and a lack of "endgame." Despite the tough competition from the dominant US and Dutch teams, the British squad remains ambitious, with a team member stating, "We're not here to just compete. We're here to win medals, we're GB." They expressed hope for stronger performances in the upcoming men's and women's relay events.
summary_tgt:
टोक्यो में विश्व एथलेटिक्स चैंपियनशिप के उद्घाटन दिवस पर ग्रेट ब्रिटेन की मिश्रित 4x400 मीटर रिले टीम निराशाजनक पाँचवें स्थान पर रही और पोडियम स्थान हासिल करने में विफल रही। इस परिणाम ने उनके वैश्विक रिले पदकों के लगातार सिलसिले को तोड़ दिया, जिसमें पेरिस 2024 ओलंपिक में हर रिले में पोडियम फिनिश (जो राष्ट्र के 10 एथलेटिक्स पदकों में से पाँच का स्रोत थे) और पिछली विश्व चैंपियनशिप में मिश्रित चौकड़ी के लिए एक रजत पदक शामिल था।

दूसरे सबसे तेज़ समय के साथ फाइनल के लिए क्वालीफाई करने के बावजूद, लुईस डेवी, एमिली न्यून्हम, टोबी हैरिस और निकोल ईयरगिन की ब्रिटिश टीम अग्रणी टीमों को चुनौती नहीं दे पाई। टीम यूएसए ने 3:08.80 के समय में चैंपियनशिप रिकॉर्ड की बराबरी की, जबकि नीदरलैंड्स (जिसका एंकर फेमके बोल थीं) और बेल्जियम ने क्रमशः रजत और कांस्य पदक जीते।

जेसिका एनिस-हिल और रॉय हॉजसन ने सामान्य निराशा व्यक्त की, और टीम के बेहतर प्रदर्शन की क्षमता को रेखांकित किया। टोबी हैरिस ने तीसरे लेग को चुनौतीपूर्ण बताया, जबकि निकोल ईयरगिन ने फेमके बोल को मौका मिलने पर भी पछाड़ न पाने पर खेद व्यक्त किया, जिसके लिए उन्होंने स्पाइक्स के टकराने और "एंडगेम" (अंतिम चरण की ताकत) की कमी का हवाला दिया। प्रमुख यूएस और डच टीमों से कड़ी प्रतिस्पर्धा के बावजूद, ब्रिटिश टीम महत्वाकांक्षी बनी हुई है, एक टीम सदस्य ने कहा, "हम यहां सिर्फ प्रतिस्पर्धा करने नहीं आए हैं। हम पदक जीतने आए हैं, हम जीबी हैं।" उन्होंने आगामी पुरुष और महिला रिले स्पर्धाओं में बेहतर प्रदर्शन की उम्मीद जताई।
meta_description: Great Britain are unable to extend their run of global relay medals as the mixed 4x400m relay team fall short of the world podium in Tokyo.

title_src: BBC Sport: Contact, Help & FAQs
text_src: If you have a question about BBC Sport, please visit the relevant page from the options below first. SPORTS COVERAGE To see which live events BBC 5 Live and 5 Live Sports Extra are commentating on in the week ahead, please visit the BBC Radio 5 Live schedule page CATCH-UP To view all our TV and Red Button sports programming available on iPlayer, please visit the BBC iPlayer Sport page. To listen to all our radio sports programming and podcasts, please Visit the BBC Sounds Sport page. MOBILE APP For information on the mobile app, including where you can download it from and details of recent updates please visit the mobile app information page. COMPLAINTS & FEEDBACK If you wish to make a formal complaint, please go to our complaints website. Any feedback you have on our TV, radio and online offering should also be sent via the complaints website so that it is properly recorded in the BBC's audience log. Our BBC editorial guidelines are also available online. QUESTION NOT COVERED HERE? See if your question has been answered by the main BBC Contact site.
summary_src:
This document outlines various ways users can access information, submit queries, and engage with content across BBC and CNN platforms.

For BBC services, individuals seeking answers to sports questions are directed to relevant BBC Sport pages, while commentary schedules for BBC Radio 5 Live and Sports Extra, along with iPlayer access for TV/Red Button sports, can be found on their respective schedule and iPlayer Sport pages. General questions should first be checked against FAQs on the main BBC Contact site before submission. Formal complaints and feedback concerning BBC TV, radio, and online content must be routed through the dedicated complaints website for proper recording. Information regarding the BBC mobile app, including downloads and updates, is available on its specific information page, and the BBC's editorial guidelines are also accessible online.

Separately, CNN.com's Travel section invites iReporters to submit photos for its weekly "Travel Snapshots" gallery, which is featured on CNN.com/Travel.
summary_tgt:
यह दस्तावेज़ उन विभिन्न तरीकों की रूपरेखा प्रस्तुत करता है जिनके माध्यम से उपयोगकर्ता बीबीसी और सीएनएन के मंचों पर जानकारी प्राप्त कर सकते हैं, प्रश्न भेज सकते हैं और सामग्री से जुड़ सकते हैं।

बीबीसी सेवाओं के लिए, खेल संबंधी प्रश्नों के उत्तर के लिए उपयोगकर्ताओं को बीबीसी स्पोर्ट के संबंधित पृष्ठों पर जाना होगा। बीबीसी रेडियो 5 लाइव और स्पोर्ट्स एक्स्ट्रा के कमेंट्री कार्यक्रम, साथ ही टीवी/रेड बटन खेलों के लिए आईप्लेयर एक्सेस, उनके संबंधित शेड्यूल और आईप्लेयर स्पोर्ट पृष्ठों पर उपलब्ध हैं। सामान्य प्रश्नों को भेजने से पहले मुख्य बीबीसी संपर्क वेबसाइट पर उपलब्ध अक्सर पूछे जाने वाले प्रश्नों (FAQs) में देख लेना चाहिए। बीबीसी टीवी, रेडियो और ऑनलाइन सामग्री से संबंधित औपचारिक शिकायतें और प्रतिक्रिया उचित रिकॉर्डिंग के लिए समर्पित शिकायत वेबसाइट के माध्यम से ही भेजी जानी चाहिए। बीबीसी मोबाइल ऐप से संबंधित जानकारी, जिसमें डाउनलोड और अपडेट शामिल हैं, उसके विशिष्ट जानकारी पृष्ठ पर उपलब्ध है, और बीबीसी के संपादकीय दिशानिर्देश भी ऑनलाइन प्राप्त किए जा सकते हैं।

अलग से, CNN.com का यात्रा अनुभाग अपनी साप्ताहिक "ट्रैवल स्नैपशॉट" गैलरी के लिए आईरिपोर्टरों को तस्वीरें भेजने के लिए आमंत्रित करता है, जिसे CNN.com/Travel पर प्रदर्शित किया जाता है।

title_src: World Athletics Championships 2025: The Africans to watch in Tokyo
text_src: More than 2,200 athletes have entered the 2025 World Athletics Championship, and a stellar list of African names will travel to Tokyo in search of glory. Women's 1500m world recorder holder Faith Kipyegon - who has not been beaten over the distance since 2019 - is among the stars who will be on show from 13-21 September. BBC Sport Africa profiles some of the track and field stars to watch in Japan.
summary_src: The 2025 World Athletics Championship in Tokyo, scheduled from September 13-21, will feature over 2,200 athletes, including a strong contingent of African stars. Among the key athletes to watch is Women's 1500m world record holder Faith Kipyegon, who has been unbeaten over the distance since 2019. BBC Sport Africa will be profiling additional track and field stars ahead of the event.
summary_tgt: टोक्यो में 13 से 21 सितंबर तक आयोजित होने वाली 2025 विश्व एथलेटिक्स चैंपियनशिप में 2,200 से अधिक एथलीट हिस्सा लेंगे, जिसमें अफ्रीकी सितारों का एक मजबूत दल भी शामिल होगा। जिन प्रमुख एथलीटों पर नज़र रहेगी उनमें महिला 1500 मीटर विश्व रिकॉर्ड धारक फेथ किपयेगोन भी हैं, जो 2019 से इस दूरी में अजेय रही हैं। बीबीसी स्पोर्ट अफ्रीका इस आयोजन से पहले अन्य ट्रैक एंड फील्ड सितारों की प्रोफाइलिंग भी करेगा।
meta_description: Olympic 200m champion Letsile Tebogo, World Indoor 800m winner Prudence Sekgodiso and 5000m world record holder Beatrice Chebet are among those hoping to make their mark in Tokyo.

title_src: Football gossip: Grealish, Wharton, Douglas Luiz, Mokio, Wilson, Anselmino, Mather, Bernal, Yildiz
text_src: Everton hopeful of signing Manchester City's Jack Grealish for less than £50m, Manchester United, Liverpool and Chelsea chase Crystal Palace's Adam Wharton, while Fulham consider Harry Wilson future. Everton are hopeful they can sign England winger Jack Grealish from Manchester City for a figure lower than the £50m fee they agreed as part of the 30-year-old's loan deal with the Toffees. (Telegraph - subscription required), external Manchester United are one of the clubs weighing up a January transfer window move for Crystal Palace midfielder Adam Wharton, with Liverpool and Chelsea also interested in the 21-year-old England international. (Caughtoffside), external Chelsea tried to sign Ghana winger Mohammed Kudus, 25, before he joined Tottenham in the summer, but could not persuade West Ham to accept a player-plus-cash deal. (Fabrizio Romano), external Nottingham Forest will have an obligation to buy on-loan Juventus midfielder Douglas Luiz, 27, for 25m euros (£21.6m) if the Brazil international plays 45 minutes of 15 Premier League matches this term. (La Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian), external Liverpool and Manchester United are among a number of clubs keeping tabs on Ajax's 17-year-old teenage star Jorthy Mokio, who has already been capped by Belgium and can play at the back or in midfield. (Teamtalk), external Borussia Dortmund could try to permanently sign Argentine defender Aaron Anselmino, 20, if he impresses on loan from Chelsea. (Bild - in German), external Manchester United's 21-year-old English winger Sam Mather is in talks to make a permanent move to Turkish club Kayserispor. (Manchester Evening News), external Chelsea, Everton and Brighton all made summer enquiries with Barcelona about 18-year-old Spanish midfielder Marc Bernal. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish), external Chelsea are interested in signing 20-year-old Juventus and Turkey striker Kenan Yildiz, but will have to pay £86m (100m euros). (Fichajes - in Spanish), external Fulham will look to cash in on midfielder Harry Wilson in January to avoid losing the 28-year-old Wales international for free in the summer. (Football Insider), external Nottingham Forest chief football officer Ross Wilson will vacate his role at the City Ground to become Newcastle's third sporting director in three years. (The I paper - subscription required), external
summary_src:
Premier League clubs are active in the transfer market with Everton reportedly hopeful of securing Jack Grealish's permanent transfer from Manchester City for less than £50m, where he is currently on loan.

Meanwhile, Manchester United, Liverpool, and Chelsea are all vying for Crystal Palace midfielder Adam Wharton. Chelsea's transfer ambitions extend to Juventus' 20-year-old striker Kenan Yildiz, for whom they may need to pay £86m, and they previously pursued Mohammed Kudus before his move to Tottenham. The Blues also made summer enquiries for Barcelona's Marc Bernal and could see Aaron Anselmino's loan to Borussia Dortmund become permanent.

Liverpool and Manchester United are among clubs monitoring 17-year-old Belgian prospect Jorthy Mokio.

Elsewhere, Nottingham Forest will be obligated to buy Douglas Luiz from Juventus for €25m if he meets a 15-game Premier League appearance clause. Fulham plans to cash in on Harry Wilson in January, and Manchester United's Sam Mather is in talks for a permanent move to Turkish side Kayserispor.

Finally, Nottingham Forest's Chief Football Officer Ross Wilson is set to leave for Newcastle, becoming their third sporting director in three years.
summary_tgt:
प्रीमियर लीग के क्लब ट्रांसफर मार्केट में सक्रिय हैं। एवर्टन कथित तौर पर जैक ग्रीलिश को मैनचेस्टर सिटी से £50 मिलियन से कम में स्थायी रूप से खरीदने की उम्मीद कर रहा है, जहाँ वह वर्तमान में लोन पर हैं।

इस बीच, मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड, लिवरपूल और चेल्सी सभी क्रिस्टल पैलेस के मिडफील्डर एडम व्हार्टन के लिए होड़ कर रहे हैं। चेल्सी की निगाहें जुवेंटस के 20 वर्षीय स्ट्राइकर केनान यिल्डिज़ पर भी हैं, जिसके लिए उन्हें £86 मिलियन चुकाने पड़ सकते हैं। चेल्सी ने मोहम्मद कुदुस को टॉटनहम जाने से पहले भी हासिल करने में दिलचस्पी दिखाई थी। ब्लूज़ ने गर्मियों में बार्सिलोना के मार्क बर्नाल के लिए भी पूछताछ की थी और आरोन एंसेलमिनो का बोरुसिया डॉर्टमंड को लोन पर दिया गया सौदा स्थायी हो सकता है।

लिवरपूल और मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड उन क्लबों में से हैं जो 17 वर्षीय बेल्जियम के युवा खिलाड़ी जोर्थी मोकियो पर नज़र रख रहे हैं।

अन्य खबरों में, नॉटिंघम फ़ॉरेस्ट जुवेंटस से डगलस लुइज़ को €25 मिलियन में खरीदने के लिए बाध्य होगा, यदि वह प्रीमियर लीग में 15 मैच खेलने की शर्त पूरी करता है। फुलहम जनवरी में हैरी विल्सन को बेचकर पैसे कमाने की योजना बना रहा है, और मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड के सैम मैथर तुर्की की टीम कायसेरिस्पोर में स्थायी रूप से जाने के लिए बातचीत कर रहे हैं।

अंत में, नॉटिंघम फ़ॉरेस्ट के मुख्य फुटबॉल अधिकारी रॉस विल्सन न्यूकैसल जाने वाले हैं, जिससे वह तीन साल में उनके तीसरे स्पोर्टिंग डायरेक्टर बन जाएंगे।
meta_description: Everton hopeful of signing Manchester City's Jack Grealish for less than £50m, Manchester United, Liverpool and Chelsea chase Crystal Palace's Adam Wharton, Fulham consider Harry Wilson future, plus more.

title_src: Canelo vs Crawford: Predictions from Frank Warren, Dillian Whyte, Amir Khan and more for super-fight
text_src: Mexico's Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez defends his undisputed super-middleweight crown against American Terence Crawford at Las Vegas' Allegiant Stadium on Saturday. Boxing fans will be treated to a dream match-up between two modern-day greats. Alvarez, 35, enters the ring with 63 wins from 67 professional bouts, with two draws and two defeats. 'Bud' Crawford, the undefeated four-division world champion and two-weight undisputed king, takes the bold step of moving up two weight classes in pursuit of even greater glory. Will the slick skills and ring IQ of the 37-year-old unsettle the bigger man? Or will Alvarez's power and proven pedigree at the higher weights shine under the Las Vegas lights? Follow live text commentary from 03:00 BST on BBC Radio 5 Live, BBC Sounds, and the BBC Sport website and app. We asked the boxing world for their predictions - here's what they said...
summary_src:
Mexico's Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez is set to defend his undisputed super-middleweight crown against American Terence Crawford this Saturday in a highly anticipated "dream match-up" between two modern-day boxing greats. The bout will take place in Las Vegas.

Alvarez, 35, enters the ring with a record of 63 wins, two draws, and two defeats from 67 professional bouts. His opponent, 'Bud' Crawford, 37, is an undefeated four-division world champion and two-weight undisputed king who is making the significant move up two weight classes for this challenge.

The fight poses a compelling question: will Crawford's slick skills and ring IQ be enough to overcome the bigger man, or will Alvarez's power and proven pedigree at higher weights prevail? Boxing fans can follow live commentary and expert predictions for this blockbuster event.
summary_tgt:
मेक्सिको के सॉल 'कैनलो' अल्वारेज़ इस शनिवार को अमेरिकी टेरेंस क्रॉफर्ड के खिलाफ अपने निर्विवाद सुपर-मिडिलवेट खिताब का बचाव करने के लिए तैयार हैं। आधुनिक युग के इन दो महान मुक्केबाजों के बीच यह एक बहुप्रतीक्षित "ड्रीम मैच-अप" है। यह मुकाबला लास वेगास में होगा।

35 वर्षीय अल्वारेज़ 67 पेशेवर मुकाबलों में 63 जीत, दो ड्रॉ और दो हार के रिकॉर्ड के साथ रिंग में उतरेंगे। उनके प्रतिद्वंद्वी, 37 वर्षीय 'बड' क्रॉफर्ड, एक अजेय चार-डिवीजन विश्व चैंपियन और दो भार वर्गों के निर्विवाद राजा हैं, जो इस चुनौती के लिए दो भार वर्ग ऊपर जा रहे हैं।

यह मुकाबला एक दिलचस्प सवाल खड़ा करता है: क्या क्रॉफर्ड के शानदार कौशल और रिंग आईक्यू अधिक वजनी प्रतिद्वंद्वी पर भारी पड़ने के लिए पर्याप्त होंगे, या अल्वारेज़ की ताकत और उच्च भार वर्गों में सिद्ध क्षमता जीत हासिल करेगी? मुक्केबाजी प्रशंसक इस ब्लॉकबस्टर इवेंट की लाइव कमेंट्री और विशेषज्ञ भविष्यवाणियों पर नज़र रख सकते हैं।
meta_description: The world of boxing gives their predictions for Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez v Terence Crawford in Las Vegas.

title_src: Lamine Yamal: Barcelona winger doubtful for Newcastle United tie in Champions League
text_src: Barcelona winger Lamine Yamal is a doubt for the Champions League game at Newcastle United - and his manager Hansi Flick has criticised Spain's treatment of the 18-year-old. Yamal played for his country in a 3-0 win in Bulgaria and 6-0 victory in Turkey during the recent international break. The forward did not take part in Barcelona's first-team training on Saturday because of a groin injury, and has been ruled out of Sunday's league game against Valencia before the visit to Newcastle on Thursday. "Lamine will not be available [against Valencia] - it's a pity," said Flick. "He played with the national team despite pain. "He had problems, played 79 and 73 minutes, and didn't even train between matches because of this pain. That is not really taking care of the players, is it? It is not. "Spain, they have the best team in the world, best players in the world. In every position they are unbelievably good. "So, maybe they will also want to take care of our players, our young players, but it's like they are doing this [to them]. This is what I can say and I'm really sad about this." Barcelona's press officer later said Yamal had "discomfort in his pubic bone" and "is doubtful for Newcastle".
summary_src:
Barcelona winger Lamine Yamal is expected to miss the remainder of the season due to pubic bone discomfort, an injury Barcelona manager Hansi Flick attributes to the Spanish national team's handling of the 18-year-old. Flick heavily criticised Spain for playing Yamal for 79 and 73 minutes in two recent international matches despite him being in pain and not training between games.

Yamal will be unavailable for Sunday's match against Valencia and is a doubt for Thursday's Champions League fixture at Newcastle United. Several figures, including a former national team captain and Arsene Wenger, echoed concerns about Spain's perceived disregard for player welfare. In additional injury news for Barcelona, Luis Suarez has been ruled out of both the Valencia and Newcastle games with a groin injury.
summary_tgt:
बार्सिलोना के विंगर लामिन यामाल के प्यूबिक बोन में असुविधा के कारण सीजन के शेष भाग से बाहर रहने की उम्मीद है। बार्सिलोना के मैनेजर हांसी फ्लिक ने इस चोट का कारण 18 वर्षीय खिलाड़ी को स्पेनिश राष्ट्रीय टीम द्वारा खिलाए जाने के तरीके को बताया है। फ्लिक ने स्पेन की कड़ी आलोचना की कि उसने यामाल को दर्द में होने और मैचों के बीच प्रशिक्षण न करने के बावजूद हालिया दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय मैचों में 79 और 73 मिनट तक खिलाया।

यामाल रविवार को वालेंसिया के खिलाफ मैच के लिए अनुपलब्ध रहेंगे और गुरुवार को न्यूकैसल यूनाइटेड के खिलाफ चैंपियंस लीग मुकाबले में उनका खेलना संदिग्ध है। एक पूर्व राष्ट्रीय टीम कप्तान और आर्सेन वेंगर सहित कई हस्तियों ने खिलाड़ी कल्याण के प्रति स्पेन की कथित उपेक्षा पर चिंता व्यक्त की है। बार्सिलोना के लिए अन्य चोट संबंधी खबरों में, लुइस सुआरेज़ ग्रोइन इंजरी के कारण वालेंसिया और न्यूकैसल दोनों मैचों से बाहर हो गए हैं।
meta_description: Barcelona winger Lamine Yamal is a doubt for the Champions League game at Newcastle United - and his manager Hansi Flick criticises Spain's treatment of the 18-year-old.

title_src: US Ryder Cup player Ben Griffin leads PGA Tour event in California
text_src: American Ben Griffin warmed up for the Ryder Cup by moving into a three-shot lead at the end of the second round of the Procore Championship. Griffin, who is part of a 12-strong United States team to play the Ryder Cup from 26-28 September in New York, shot a second round 66 in Napa, California. The 29-year-old sank six birdies without dropping a shot as he moved to 14 under. "I've been pretty focused on this golf tournament," said Griffin, who was a captain's pick by US Ryder Cup skipper Keegan Bradley and will be making his debut in the event. "Without a doubt, off the golf course hanging out with the guys and stuff, there's been some Ryder Cup presence. But once I get on the first tee, I'm thinking I'm trying to play well here. "This week I'm trying to literally do the same stuff I'm doing. I'm trying to stay confident, stay motivated and keep the pedal down."
summary_src: American golfer Ben Griffin has moved into a three-shot lead at the Procore Championship in Napa, California, after shooting a second-round 66 that included six birdies and no dropped shots, bringing his tournament total to 12 under par. Griffin, a 29-year-old captain's pick for the United States Ryder Cup team, is simultaneously preparing for the prestigious event set for late September in Gleneagles, Scotland. Despite the looming Ryder Cup, Griffin stated his primary focus remains on the current championship, aiming to stay confident and play well, while acknowledging the Ryder Cup's presence off the golf course.
summary_tgt:
अमेरिकी गोल्फर बेन ग्रिफिन ने नापा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया में प्रोकोर चैंपियनशिप में दूसरे राउंड में 66 का स्कोर करके तीन शॉट की बढ़त बना ली है। इस राउंड में उन्होंने छह बर्डी लगाईं और कोई भी शॉट नहीं गंवाया, जिससे उनका टूर्नामेंट का कुल स्कोर 12 अंडर पार हो गया है।

29 वर्षीय ग्रिफिन को संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका की राइडर कप टीम के लिए कप्तान द्वारा चुना गया है, और वह सितंबर के अंत में ग्लेनेगल्स, स्कॉटलैंड में होने वाली इस प्रतिष्ठित प्रतियोगिता के लिए भी साथ ही तैयारी कर रहे हैं।

आगामी राइडर कप के बावजूद, ग्रिफिन ने कहा है कि उनका प्राथमिक ध्यान मौजूदा चैंपियनशिप पर ही केंद्रित है। उनका लक्ष्य आत्मविश्वास बनाए रखना और अच्छा प्रदर्शन करना है, हालांकि वह गोल्फ कोर्स के बाहर राइडर कप की उपस्थिति को स्वीकार करते हैं।
meta_description: American Ben Griffin warms up for the Ryder Cup by moving into a three-shot lead  at the end of the second round of the Procore Championship.

title_src: Where and how to watch BBC News
text_src: How to watch BBC News at home BBC News, the 24-hour news channel is available, in the UK, and over 200 countries worldwide. In the US, BBC News is available with a range of television service providers. Some of our programmes are also available on PBS. If you're in the US and Australia, you can watch the live simulcast on BBC.com. In India, you can watch BBC World News and find listings information here. For all other territories please check your local listings or contact a television provider in your area to find out how you can receive BBC News. If you do not currently receive BBC News, please contact your service provider to request it. How to watch BBC News while travelling BBC News is the go-to destination for travellers eager to keep up to date with the latest news from around the globe - whenever and wherever they want it. Our content is available in millions of hotel rooms, on airplanes, cruise ships and mobile devices around the world. To find out how you can view BBC News while travelling, have a look at our partners website, external, external.
summary_src: BBC News, the 24-hour news channel, is globally accessible in the UK and over 200 countries. In the UK, it's available on BBC iPlayer, which also offers a live simulcast for viewers in the UK and Ireland. For those in the US, BBC News is provided through various television service providers, with some programs also featured on PBS and a live simulcast available on BBC.com. Australian viewers can also watch the live simulcast on BBC.com. In India, BBC World News can be accessed via local listings, BBC iPlayer, and the BBC News channel. Some programs are also broadcast on the BBC World Service. For other territories, viewers should consult local listings or contact a television provider. BBC News content is also widely available for travellers in hotels, on airplanes, cruise ships, and mobile devices worldwide. More information can be found on the official BBC website.
summary_tgt:
बीबीसी न्यूज़, जो एक 24-घंटे का समाचार चैनल है, यूके और 200 से अधिक देशों में विश्व भर में उपलब्ध है।

यूके में, यह बीबीसी आईप्लेयर पर उपलब्ध है, जो यूके और आयरलैंड के दर्शकों के लिए सीधा प्रसारण (live simulcast) भी प्रदान करता है। अमेरिका में रहने वालों के लिए, बीबीसी न्यूज़ विभिन्न टेलीविज़न सेवा प्रदाताओं के माध्यम से उपलब्ध है, जिसमें कुछ कार्यक्रम पीबीएस (PBS) पर भी दिखाए जाते हैं और इसका सीधा प्रसारण BBC.com पर भी उपलब्ध है। ऑस्ट्रेलियाई दर्शक भी BBC.com पर सीधा प्रसारण देख सकते हैं।

भारत में, बीबीसी वर्ल्ड न्यूज़ को स्थानीय लिस्टिंग, बीबीसी आईप्लेयर और बीबीसी न्यूज़ चैनल के माध्यम से देखा जा सकता है। कुछ कार्यक्रम बीबीसी वर्ल्ड सर्विस पर भी प्रसारित होते हैं।

अन्य क्षेत्रों के लिए, दर्शकों को स्थानीय लिस्टिंग देखनी चाहिए या किसी टेलीविज़न सेवा प्रदाता से संपर्क करना चाहिए।

बीबीसी न्यूज़ की सामग्री दुनिया भर के होटलों में, हवाई जहाजों पर, क्रूज़ शिप पर और मोबाइल उपकरणों पर भी यात्रियों के लिए व्यापक रूप से उपलब्ध है।

अधिक जानकारी बीबीसी की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर मिल सकती है।

title_src: World Athletics Championships 2025: Japan celebrate first medal as athletes battle Tokyo heat
text_src: Japan celebrated the return to Tokyo of a premier global sporting event with a medal in a curtain-raising 35km race walk contested in gruelling conditions at the World Athletics Championships. Despite the road race start times being moved 30 minutes earlier than scheduled, in anticipation of the heat over the opening weekend in the Japanese capital, temperatures still climbed to 30C over the course of the first morning session. That was accompanied by stifling humidity above 90%. Canadian men's 35km race walk winner Evan Dunfee described the race - which for him lasted almost two and a half hours - as "absolutely brutal". Four years after Tokyo hosted the postponed 2020 Olympics behind closed doors because of the coronavirus pandemic, home athlete Hayato Katsuki held on to a podium place to the delight of those watching the finish inside Japan's National Stadium on Saturday morning. With the streets outside also lined by enthusiastic supporters as the nine-day championships began, it marked a poignant moment for the host nation after it was denied the opportunity to cheer on its athletes at the same location for its Games. That is a lost opportunity for which the people of Japan intend to make up for over the next nine days, with close to 500,000 tickets sold and some night sessions completely sold out according to World Athletics president Lord Coe.
summary_src:
The World Athletics Championships have commenced in Tokyo, marked by a medal for Japan in the opening 35km race walk. The event began under gruelling conditions, with temperatures reaching 30C and humidity exceeding 90%, leading to race start times being moved earlier. Canadian winner Evan Dunfee called the race "absolutely brutal."

This championship holds significant meaning for Japan, offering a chance to finally welcome enthusiastic supporters after the postponed 2020 Olympics were held behind closed doors. With nearly 500,000 tickets sold and some night sessions fully booked, fans are now able to cheer on athletes in person, including Japan's Hayato Katsuki who secured a podium place, providing a poignant experience for the host nation over the nine-day event.
summary_tgt:
टोक्यो में विश्व एथलेटिक्स चैंपियनशिप शुरू हो गई है, जिसमें उद्घाटन 35 किमी रेस वॉक में जापान को एक पदक मिला है। यह आयोजन भीषण परिस्थितियों में शुरू हुआ, जहाँ तापमान 30 डिग्री सेल्सियस तक पहुँच गया था और आर्द्रता 90% से अधिक थी, जिसके चलते रेस शुरू होने का समय पहले कर दिया गया। कनाडाई विजेता एवन डन्फी ने रेस को 'अत्यंत कठिन' बताया।

यह चैंपियनशिप जापान के लिए बहुत मायने रखती है, क्योंकि 2020 के स्थगित ओलंपिक बंद दरवाजों के पीछे आयोजित होने के बाद यह आखिरकार उत्साही प्रशंसकों का स्वागत करने का एक मौका प्रदान करती है। लगभग 500,000 टिकट बिकने और कुछ रात्रि सत्रों के पूरी तरह से बुक होने के साथ, प्रशंसक अब व्यक्तिगत रूप से एथलीटों का उत्साहवर्धन कर पा रहे हैं, जिनमें जापान के हायातो काटसुकी जैसे खिलाड़ी भी शामिल हैं, जिन्होंने पोडियम पर जगह बनाई है। यह नौ दिवसीय आयोजन मेजबान राष्ट्र के लिए एक मार्मिक अनुभव प्रदान कर रहा है।
meta_description: Japan celebrates the return of a premier global sporting event to Tokyo with a world medal in a curtain-raising 35km race walk event contested in brutal conditions.

title_src: Ange Postecoglou says he "cannot afford to waste time" at Nottingham Forest
text_src: Postecoglou's first game in charge of Nottingham Forest has to be assessed in a measured fashion given he is one week into the job and facing an Arsenal side almost six years into their project. The Australian has had limited time to put his stamp on this Forest side but a few differences were evident pointing to the direction Postecoglou might look to take Forest. The most obvious was starting with a back four. It appears the 4-4-1-1 that Postecoglou has deployed across his career is to be maintained. Stylistically, Forest aimed to build in a slower fashion - looking to establish territory higher up the pitch, rather than playing the more direct, counter-attacking style that was successful last season. Data from Opta showed that their 'direct speed' - how quickly they move the ball from defence to attack - was their joint-lowest for a game in the league since the start of last season. Out of possession, they set up in what looked like a 4-2-3-1 shape and defended in a man-marking fashion. We will have to see more from Postecoglou to know if this man-to-man approach defensively is something they persist with or if this was specific to Arsenal given their quality and rotation-heavy style. Nuno by comparison tended to set Forest up in a zonal fashion (meaning each player defended specific zones, rather than following individual players) but did use a man-to-man defence at times against the league's top teams. Forest's defensive line was set higher up the pitch than under Nuno, but they were punished for this with Gyokeres' strike. Arsenal exploited a long pass over the top of the defence for Eze to run on to as Forest failed to apply pressure on the passer. Naturally, Forest's collective understanding of when to push up and apply pressure will improve with time. Lastly, the biggest difference between Postecoglou's tactics today with how he has set up his teams at previous clubs was the use of full-backs. In build-up, Forest played in a fairly standard 4-3-3 shape with full-backs starting in wide positions rather than inverting into midfield as has been the norm in his sides. Was this a short-term tactic given the lack of preparation time? It is difficult to make any definitive conclusions based on a single game in Postecoglou's first week in charge; however there were numerous new ideas at play against Arsenal that may become more evident in upcoming weeks.
summary_src:
In his initial match as Nottingham Forest manager, Ange Postecoglou introduced several significant tactical shifts despite having only one week in charge. While definitive conclusions are premature, Forest appeared to adopt his favoured 4-4-1-1 formation, transitioning to a 4-3-3 in build-up with full-backs positioned wide, a departure from his previous inverted full-back usage.

Stylistically, the team moved away from last season's direct, counter-attacking approach, opting for a slower build-up to establish higher territory, as evidenced by Opta's 'direct speed' data. Defensively, Forest operated in a 4-2-3-1 shape, employing a man-marking system and a higher defensive line, a change from Nuno Espírito Santo's predominantly zonal setup. This higher line was exploited by Arsenal with a long pass for their goal, highlighting an area for improvement in collective understanding and pressure.

The long-term permanence of these specific tactics, particularly the man-marking and full-back roles, remains to be seen, potentially influenced by the limited preparation time. However, Postecoglou's distinct new ideas were clearly at play, setting a new direction for the club.
summary_tgt:
नॉटिंघम फ़ॉरेस्ट के मैनेजर के रूप में अपने पहले मैच में, एंग पोस्तेकोग्लू ने प्रभारी के तौर पर सिर्फ एक हफ़्ते का समय मिलने के बावजूद कई महत्वपूर्ण सामरिक बदलाव पेश किए। हालांकि, कोई पुख्ता निष्कर्ष निकालना अभी जल्दबाजी होगी, लेकिन फ़ॉरेस्ट ने उनकी पसंदीदा 4-4-1-1 फॉर्मेशन अपनाई हुई प्रतीत हुई, जो गेंद बनाते समय (बिल्ड-अप में) 4-3-3 में बदल जाती थी, जिसमें फुल-बैक को चौड़ा (वाइड) तैनात किया गया था। यह उनके पिछले इनवर्टेड फुल-बैक के उपयोग से हटकर था।

शैलीगत रूप से, टीम पिछले सीज़न के सीधे, जवाबी हमले (काउंटर-अटैकिंग) के तरीके से हट गई, और अधिक क्षेत्र (टेरिटरी) स्थापित करने के लिए धीमी बिल्ड-अप का विकल्प चुना, जैसा कि ऑप्टा के 'डायरेक्ट स्पीड' डेटा से पता चलता है। रक्षात्मक रूप से, फ़ॉरेस्ट ने 4-2-3-1 के आकार में काम किया, जिसमें मैन-मार्किंग प्रणाली और एक उच्च रक्षात्मक पंक्ति (डिफेंसिव लाइन) का उपयोग किया गया। यह नूनो एस्पिरिटो सैंटो की मुख्य रूप से ज़ोनल प्रणाली से एक बदलाव था। इस उच्च पंक्ति का फायदा आर्सेनल ने अपने गोल के लिए एक लंबी पास के साथ उठाया, जो टीम की सामूहिक समझ और दबाव बनाने में सुधार के एक क्षेत्र को उजागर करता है।

इन विशिष्ट रणनीति, विशेष रूप से मैन-मार्किंग और फुल-बैक की भूमिकाओं की दीर्घकालिक स्थिरता अभी देखना बाकी है, जो संभवतः सीमित तैयारी के समय से प्रभावित हुई है। हालांकि, पोस्तेकोग्लू के विशिष्ट नए विचार स्पष्ट रूप से खेल में थे, जिससे क्लब के लिए एक नई दिशा तय हुई।
meta_description: Ange Postecoglou says his appointment at Nottingham Forest is not a "project" and he will seek to instantly implement a new style of play at the club.

title_src: Notifications, social media and more with BBC Sport
text_src: The BBC Sport app offers two types of notification. With news notifications you can have the biggest sport stories and the best content right at your fingertips. Stay in the know by picking from our offering of top sport headlines, football news - including the biggest updates, features and analysis on your Premier League, Championship and Scottish Premiership club - and news from nine other major sports, as well as the best from each nation of the United Kingdom. You can also sign up to get alerts to our latest Insight in-depth features. You can also follow your team from wherever you are with our massive range of event notifications. We offer notifications across five sports - football, cricket, Formula 1, rugby union and rugby league - covering every major moment. Line-ups, kick-offs, and half-time scores, goals, wickets, tries and conversions, results and times on the wave of the chequered flag. We serve more than 400 teams, with more to come.
summary_src:
The BBC Sport app, available on iOS and Android devices, offers extensive notifications for a wide range of sports, including football, cricket, Formula 1, rugby union and league, tennis, motor racing, and golf. Users can receive alerts for major moments, in-depth features, and follow over 400 teams globally, with more than 1,000 in the UK and a presence in the US, covering events like the 2014 World Cup.

Separately, CNN.com/Travel will feature weekly "Travel Snapshots" galleries, showcasing iReporter photos.

In upcoming sports, Saturday will see action in the Premier League, including Manchester City versus West Bromwich Albion, the Scottish Premiership, and the Championship, with West Ham hosting Ipswich Town.
summary_tgt:
यहाँ उस अंग्रेजी समाचार सारांश का हिंदी अनुवाद है:

आईओएस और एंड्रॉयड डिवाइसों पर उपलब्ध बीबीसी स्पोर्ट ऐप, फुटबॉल, क्रिकेट, फॉर्मूला 1, रग्बी यूनियन और लीग, टेनिस, मोटर रेसिंग और गोल्फ सहित विभिन्न खेलों के लिए व्यापक सूचनाएं (नोटिफिकेशंस) प्रदान करता है। यूज़र्स प्रमुख क्षणों, गहन फीचर्स के लिए अलर्ट प्राप्त कर सकते हैं और विश्व स्तर पर 400 से अधिक टीमों को फॉलो कर सकते हैं, जिनमें यूके में 1,000 से अधिक टीमें शामिल हैं। इसकी अमेरिका में भी मौजूदगी है, जो 2014 विश्व कप जैसे आयोजनों को कवर करती है।

अलग से, CNN.com/Travel साप्ताहिक "ट्रैवल स्नैपशॉट्स" गैलरीज़ पेश करेगा, जिनमें iReporter की तस्वीरें दिखाई जाएंगी।

आगामी खेलों की बात करें तो, शनिवार को प्रीमियर लीग में मैनचेस्टर सिटी बनाम वेस्ट ब्रोमविच एल्बियन सहित मुकाबले होंगे। स्कॉटिश प्रीमियर लीग और चैंपियनशिप में भी एक्शन देखने को मिलेगा, जिसमें वेस्ट हैम इप्सविच टाउन की मेजबानी करेगा।
meta_description: With latest scores and headlines sent straight to your device, personalisation and much more, ensure you have a great sporting life with BBC Sport.

title_src: Davis Cup 2025: Cameron Norrie seals Great Britain's place in next year's qualifiers
text_src: Great Britain captain Leon Smith says his team have a "really good chance" of winning next year's Davis Cup if world number seven Jack Draper is fit and available. British number two Cameron Norrie sealed a place in February's qualifiers - and therefore a chance to go after the 2026 title - with victory over Poland's Olaf Pieczkowski on Saturday. Norrie produced a professional performance, dropping just three points on serve, to win 6-4 6-4 against the world number 484 and give Britain an unassailable 3-1 lead in the best-of-five World Group 1 tie. "Honestly, I think we've got a really good chance [of winning]," said Smith. "It comes down to who is available to play. You need your top players to try and win it - that's clear. But I hope the players are motivated to play." Smith was without British number one Draper in Poland because of a season-ending arm injury that caused the 23-year-old to withdraw from the US Open after a first-round win. "I think there's an appetite from our top players to want to play, and of course if you have got someone like Jack [Draper], when he comes into the team and you've got a top-tenner, it obviously makes a difference as well," said Smith. "We've got good depth with Cam [Norrie], Jacob [Fearnley], Arthur [Fery] and there's others, and with strong doubles options you have a chance." Britain last won the Davis Cup in 2015 when Sir Andy Murray was part of the team. Norrie's victory to seal Britain's place in February's first round came after Wimbledon champions Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool missed an earlier chance when they lost their doubles rubber. The world number one pairing, making their Davis Cup debuts, were stunned 3-6 6-3 7-6 (8-6) by Karol Drzewiecki and Jan Zielinski. That outcome put the onus on Norrie to clinch the tie for Britain or risk the team facing a deciding match, and he came up with the required result to earn high fives from colleagues at courtside. Britain had needed just one win on Saturday to progress from the tie after Norrie and Arthur Fery, who made his Davis Cup debut in the absence of Draper and Fearnley, won their respective singles matches on Friday. Defeat in Poland would have meant a February play-off which could have resulted in relegation to World Group 2, but instead they are heading back to the elite level.
summary_src:
Great Britain has secured a spot in next year's Davis Cup qualifiers after defeating Poland 3-1 in their World Group 1 tie, effectively avoiding relegation. Cameron Norrie clinched the decisive point with a dominant performance against Olaf Pieczkowski.

Captain Leon Smith expressed strong optimism about Great Britain's chances of winning the Davis Cup, stating they have a "really good chance" if world number seven Jack Draper is fit and available. Draper was absent from the Poland tie due to a season-ending arm injury, but Smith emphasized that player availability and motivation are crucial for success.

Despite a loss from debutant doubles pair Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool, Norrie's win, alongside Arthur Fery's singles victory on Friday, ensured Britain's progression to the elite level. Smith also highlighted the team's "good depth" and strong doubles options. Britain, who last won the Davis Cup in 2015, is now aiming for their first title since 1986.
summary_tgt:
**डेविस कप: ग्रेट ब्रिटेन ने पोलैंड को हराकर अगले साल के क्वालिफायर में बनाई जगह**

ग्रेट ब्रिटेन ने अपने वर्ल्ड ग्रुप 1 टाई में पोलैंड को 3-1 से हराकर अगले साल के डेविस कप क्वालिफायर में अपनी जगह पक्की कर ली है। इस जीत से उन्होंने निचले स्तर में जाने (रेलीगेशन) से भी खुद को बचा लिया है। कैमरन नॉरी ने ओलाफ पीज़कोव्स्की के खिलाफ शानदार प्रदर्शन करते हुए निर्णायक अंक हासिल किया।

कप्तान लियोन स्मिथ ने डेविस कप जीतने की ग्रेट ब्रिटेन की संभावनाओं पर दृढ़ आशावाद व्यक्त किया। उन्होंने कहा कि यदि विश्व के सातवें नंबर के खिलाड़ी जैक ड्रेपर फिट और उपलब्ध होते हैं, तो उनके पास "वास्तव में अच्छा मौका" होगा। ड्रेपर सत्र समाप्त करने वाली हाथ की चोट के कारण पोलैंड टाई से अनुपस्थित थे, लेकिन स्मिथ ने इस बात पर जोर दिया कि खिलाड़ियों की उपलब्धता और प्रेरणा सफलता के लिए महत्वपूर्ण हैं।

पदार्पण करने वाली डबल्स जोड़ी जूलियन कैश और लॉयड ग्लासपूल की हार के बावजूद, नॉरी की जीत और शुक्रवार को आर्थर फेयरी की एकल जीत ने ब्रिटेन को शीर्ष स्तर में आगे बढ़ना सुनिश्चित किया। स्मिथ ने टीम की "अच्छी गहराई" और मजबूत डबल्स विकल्पों पर भी प्रकाश डाला।

ब्रिटेन, जिसने आखिरी बार 2015 में डेविस कप जीता था, अब 1986 के बाद अपने पहले खिताब का लक्ष्य बना रहा है।
meta_description: British number two Cameron Norrie sealed Great Britain's place in next year's Davis Cup qualifiers with victory over Poland's Olaf Pieczkowski.

title_src: NFL: Aaron Rodgers impresses on Pittsburgh Steelers debut but can he reach Super Bowl?
text_src: Rodgers has always demanded a lot from his team-mates and called out one of his receivers during a post-match news conference last season. Perhaps Sunday's game showed that the veteran has mellowed - and that he is able to compensate for his limited movement following his season-ending injury in 2023. "He's able to get the ball out so fast and be so accurate, and he's making changes at the line of scrimmage," said Schecter. "The way his brain works, he's like having a coach on the football field. "He has really developed so much, not just from a quarterback perspective, but in terms of how he's managing his team-mates," she added. "There's a great example in the game when DK Metcalf, a star receiver, drops the football. Perhaps in the past, Rodgers wouldn't have gone back to him, but the next play he gets the football in his hands. That's the new version of Aaron Rodgers that we're so excited to see." Rodgers, whose solitary Super Bowl win came against Pittsburgh in 2011, turns 42 in December, but Tom Brady won his last Super Bowl aged 43 and retired at 45. The Steelers have not won a play-off game since 2017 but Mike Tomlin is used to grinding out results as, since becoming their head coach in 2007, he is yet to have a losing season. "I don't think age is the issue [for Rodgers]," said Schecter. "I mean, look at Tom Brady and what he was able to do. I think he's changed the narrative around what age you can be in order to play this amazing sport, especially at quarterback. "And because of [Rodgers'] football IQ, there's no defence that he has not seen or come up against in all of his years, so it's really up to him." What could be Rodgers' farewell tour continues at home to the Seattle Seahawks on Sunday. Pittsburgh play the Minnesota Vikings in Dublin on 28 September and have two of the NFL's best quarterbacks in their division - the AFC North - so Rodgers could play two games against both Lamar Jackson (Baltimore) and Joe Burrow (Cincinnati). He is set to face last season's MVP, Josh Allen (Buffalo), and has a reunion with Green Bay scheduled for 26 October in Pittsburgh. Schecter said: "Does he want to continue to play after this? Or is this a season where he thinks, I'm with a team who are perennial winners, they always make it to the play-offs. They've just been missing that little spice, and maybe Aaron Rodgers can be that extra bit that pushes them all the way to bring home a Lombardi Trophy."
summary_src:
Aaron Rodgers appears to have adopted a more mellow leadership style this season, a notable shift from his past demanding demeanor. Despite limited mobility following his 2023 season-ending injury, experts commend his quick, accurate passing and pre-snap adjustments, with some likening his high football IQ to having a "coach on the field." Coach Todd Graham highlighted Rodgers' enhanced team management, exemplified by his immediate decision to re-target a star receiver after a dropped pass, showcasing a "new version" of the quarterback.

Approaching 42, Rodgers is challenging the narrative around age in professional football, drawing comparisons to Tom Brady's late-career success. His extensive experience means he has encountered every defensive scheme. While this season could potentially be his "farewell tour," featuring a challenging schedule including matchups against top quarterbacks, the key question remains whether he will continue playing beyond this year, potentially driven by the desire to secure another Lombardi Trophy with a perennial winning team.
summary_tgt:
**एरॉन रॉजर्स ने अपनाई नई नेतृत्व शैली, मैदान पर "कोच" जैसा प्रदर्शन**

एरॉन रॉजर्स ने इस सीज़न में एक अधिक शांत नेतृत्व शैली अपनाई है, जो उनके पिछले मांग करने वाले (या कठोर) रवैये से एक उल्लेखनीय बदलाव है। 2023 में सीज़न समाप्त करने वाली चोट के कारण सीमित गतिशीलता के बावजूद, विशेषज्ञ उनकी तेज़, सटीक पासिंग और प्री-स्नैप समायोजन की सराहना करते हैं। कुछ लोग उनके उच्च फुटबॉल IQ की तुलना मैदान पर एक "कोच" होने से करते हैं। कोच टॉड ग्राहम ने रॉजर्स के बेहतर टीम प्रबंधन पर प्रकाश डाला, जिसका उदाहरण एक छूटे हुए पास के तुरंत बाद एक स्टार रिसीवर को फिर से निशाना बनाने के उनके निर्णय से मिलता है, जो क्वार्टरबैक के एक "नए संस्करण" को दर्शाता है।

42 के करीब पहुँचते हुए, रॉजर्स पेशेवर फुटबॉल में उम्र को लेकर प्रचलित धारणा को चुनौती दे रहे हैं, जिनकी तुलना टॉम ब्रैडी की करियर के अंतिम पड़ाव की सफलता से की जा रही है। उनके व्यापक अनुभव का मतलब है कि उन्होंने हर रक्षात्मक रणनीति का सामना किया है। हालाँकि, यह सीज़न संभावित रूप से उनका "विदाई दौरा" हो सकता है, जिसमें शीर्ष क्वार्टरबैक के खिलाफ़ मुकाबलों सहित एक चुनौतीपूर्ण कार्यक्रम शामिल है, फिर भी मुख्य प्रश्न यह बना हुआ है कि क्या वह इस साल के बाद भी खेलना जारी रखेंगे। यह शायद एक स्थायी विजेता टीम के साथ एक और लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी हासिल करने की इच्छा से प्रेरित होगा।
meta_description: After an impressive debut for Pittsburgh, how far will veteran quarterback Aaron Rodgers lead the Steelers in what could be the four-time MVP's final NFL season?

title_src: The places where 'hearing voices' is seen as a good thing
text_src: Western medicine typically views anyone who admits to being told what to do by disembodied voices as suffering from psychosis. But that is not the case everywhere – so what can we learn from those who treat these hallucinations differently? Hearing voices is more common than you might think. Studies through the decades have shown that a surprising number of people without any previously diagnosed mental health condition – often more than three quarters of those taking part – experience voices speaking to them from an unknown source. In Western psychiatry, however, these auditory hallucinations are one of the principal symptoms of psychotic disorders. And the resulting stigma surrounding these mental health conditions means that few people will publicly admit to hearing voices in their head. But in some cultures these hallucinations are not only widely accepted but actively celebrated. They are seen as offering guidance or as helping to keep people safe. What can we learn about mental health from other cultures? And can we see people who experience hearing voices in a different light? Local expectations shaped by the culture, environment and people we grow up with affect whether those who experience hallucinations are judged to be ill, or not, says Tanya Luhrmann, a professor of anthropology from Stanford University in the US, and co-author of the book Our Most Troubling Madness.
summary_src:
Western medicine primarily classifies hearing disembodied voices as a symptom of psychosis and a principal indicator of psychotic disorders. However, this perspective is not universal. A study by the University of California, San Francisco, indicates that hearing voices is more common than widely believed, with a significant number of individuals—often over three-quarters of those surveyed—experiencing such auditory hallucinations without any previously diagnosed mental health condition.

Despite its prevalence, the stigma surrounding these experiences often prevents individuals from admitting to them publicly. Conversely, in some cultures, these hallucinations are not only widely accepted but actively celebrated, seen as sources of guidance, safety, or valuable information. As noted by Tanya Luhrmann, local expectations shaped by culture, environment, and upbringing significantly determine whether an individual's experience of hallucinations is judged as an illness or not, prompting a re-evaluation of how mental health is understood across different societies.
summary_tgt:
पश्चिमी चिकित्सा मुख्य रूप से शरीर रहित आवाज़ें सुनने को मनोविकृति (psychosis) का एक लक्षण और मनोविकार (psychotic disorders) का एक प्रमुख संकेतक मानती है। हालांकि, यह दृष्टिकोण सार्वभौमिक नहीं है। कैलिफोर्निया विश्वविद्यालय, सैन फ्रांसिस्को (UCSF) के एक अध्ययन से पता चलता है कि आवाज़ें सुनना जितना व्यापक रूप से माना जाता है, उससे कहीं अधिक सामान्य है। इस अध्ययन में सर्वेक्षण किए गए लोगों में से अक्सर तीन-चौथाई से अधिक व्यक्तियों को, बिना किसी पूर्व-निदानित मानसिक स्वास्थ्य स्थिति के, ऐसे श्रवण मतिभ्रम (auditory hallucinations) का अनुभव होता है।

इसकी व्यापकता के बावजूद, इन अनुभवों से जुड़ा कलंक अक्सर व्यक्तियों को इन्हें सार्वजनिक रूप से स्वीकार करने से रोकता है। इसके विपरीत, कुछ संस्कृतियों में, इन मतिभ्रमों को न केवल व्यापक रूप से स्वीकार किया जाता है बल्कि सक्रिय रूप से मनाया भी जाता है, उन्हें मार्गदर्शन, सुरक्षा या मूल्यवान जानकारी के स्रोत के रूप में देखा जाता है। जैसा कि तान्या लुहरमैन ने उल्लेख किया है, संस्कृति, पर्यावरण और पालन-पोषण द्वारा आकारित स्थानीय अपेक्षाएँ यह निर्धारित करने में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाती हैं कि किसी व्यक्ति के मतिभ्रम के अनुभव को बीमारी माना जाता है या नहीं। यह विभिन्न समाजों में मानसिक स्वास्थ्य को कैसे समझा जाता है, इसके पुनर्मूल्यांकन की आवश्यकता पर बल देता है।
meta_description: Western medicine views hearing disembodied voices as a symptom of psychosis. But that's not the case everywhere.

title_src: Mascara and strings of tampons: How Nasa's baffled engineers tried to prepare for the first female astronauts in space
text_src: In 1978 Nasa announced 35 new astronauts for a new era of spaceflight – and six of them were women. Here's how the Space Shuttle programme chipped away at one of Nasa's blind spots. On 18 June 1983, Space Shuttle Challenger prepared for launch. STS-7 was Nasa's seventh Shuttle mission for the world's first reusable spacecraft. On board, among its crew of five, was Californian physicist Sally Ride. Until then, only two women had ever been into space. Soviet cosmonaut Valentina Tereshkova had made history more than two decades earlier in 1961. Nineteen years later, in 1982, Svetlana Savitskaya became the second woman in space after the Soviets got wind that the US was going to fly its first woman. Although an astronaut Barbie doll appeared in US shops in 1965 – sporting practical boots and a silvery spacesuit – American women had to wait a lot longer for the real thing. By the 1980s both the world and fashion had changed. The revamped 1985 astronaut Barbie sported glittery silver leggings and had a matching handbag. There were fuchsia-pink puffed sleeves, a short skirt and pink knee-length high-heeled boots. While heels were definitely not part of Ride's mission accessories, Nasa did provide cosmetics in the form of mascara, eye shadow and lipstick. They were inside a Personal Preference Kit (PPK) for its six new female astronauts: Ride, Judy Resnik, Anna Fisher, Kathryn Sullivan, Shannon Lucid and Rhea Seddon.
summary_src:
In 1978, NASA heralded a new era of spaceflight by selecting six women among its 35 new astronauts, a significant shift facilitated by the Space Shuttle program. On June 18, 1983, Californian physicist Sally Ride made history as the third woman in space, serving on the five-person crew of Space Shuttle Challenger's STS-7 mission. She followed Soviet cosmonauts Valentina Tereshkova, who became the first woman in space in 1961, and Svetlana Savitskaya, who was the second in 1982.

The article highlights the cultural contrast of the time: while an astronaut Barbie doll evolved from a practical 1965 design to a glamorous, high-heeled 1985 version, NASA prioritized practicality for its real female astronauts. For Ride and the other five pioneering women selected in 1978—Judy Resnik, Anna Fisher, Kathryn Sullivan, Shannon Lucid, and Rhea Seddon—NASA included cosmetics like mascara, eye shadow, and lipstick in their Personal Preference Kits, but notably, no high heels, acknowledging the functional demands of space travel.
summary_tgt:
यहाँ उस अंग्रेजी समाचार सारांश का हिंदी अनुवाद है:

1978 में, नासा ने अपने 35 नए अंतरिक्ष यात्रियों में छह महिलाओं का चयन करके अंतरिक्ष यात्रा के एक नए युग की शुरुआत की। यह स्पेस शटल कार्यक्रम के कारण संभव हुआ एक महत्वपूर्ण बदलाव था। 18 जून 1983 को, कैलिफ़ोर्नियाई भौतिक विज्ञानी सैली राइड ने अंतरिक्ष में जाने वाली तीसरी महिला बनकर इतिहास रच दिया। उन्होंने स्पेस शटल चैलेंजर के एसटीएस-7 मिशन के पाँच सदस्यीय दल में कार्य किया। उनसे पहले सोवियत अंतरिक्ष यात्री वेलेंटीना तेरेश्कोवा (जो 1961 में अंतरिक्ष में जाने वाली पहली महिला बनीं) और स्वेतलाना सवित्स्काया (जो 1982 में दूसरी महिला थीं) अंतरिक्ष में जा चुकी थीं।

यह लेख उस समय के सांस्कृतिक विरोधाभास को उजागर करता है: जहां 1965 की व्यावहारिक डिज़ाइन वाली एस्ट्रोनॉट बार्बी डॉल 1985 तक एक आकर्षक, ऊंची एड़ी वाली बार्बी में बदल गई थी, वहीं नासा ने अपनी वास्तविक महिला अंतरिक्ष यात्रियों के लिए व्यावहारिकता को प्राथमिकता दी। राइड और 1978 में चुनी गई अन्य पाँच अग्रणी महिलाओं — जूडी रेसनिक, अन्ना फिशर, कैथरीन सुलिवन, शैनन ल्यूसिड और रिया सेड्डन — के लिए, नासा ने उनकी पर्सनल प्रेफरेंस किट (Personal Preference Kits) में काजल (mascara), आई शैडो (eye shadow) और लिपस्टिक (lipstick) जैसे सौंदर्य प्रसाधन शामिल किए थे। लेकिन अंतरिक्ष यात्रा की कार्यात्मक आवश्यकताओं को ध्यान में रखते हुए, इसमें ऊंची एड़ी के जूते शामिल नहीं थे।
meta_description: In 1978 Nasa announced 35 new astronauts for a new era of spaceflight – and six of them were women. Here's how the Space Shuttle programme chipped away at one of Nasa's blind spots.

title_src: The Denbigh builder who photographed galaxies
text_src: The builder who photographed distant galaxies 6 hours ago Share Save Neil Prior BBC News Share Save Roberts-Klumpke Trust Isaac Roberts was the first person to take a clear image of our nearest large galaxy, Andromeda, 2.5 million light years away A successful builder by day and traversing the sky by night, Isaac Roberts took the first clear photograph of Andromeda, the closest galaxy to our Milky Way. Mr Roberts, born in 1829 and the son of a farmer at Groes-bach Farm near Denbigh, took the photograph in 1888, revealing its distinctive spiral structure and mysterious dark lines to a doubting world. He worked as a builder in Liverpool, having moved there aged seven, then spent the latter part of his life as a neighbour of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle at Crowborough in Sussex. But his telescope revealed far more mysteries than Sherlock Holmes could ever have dreamt. Roberts-Klumpke Trust Isaac Roberts demonstrated the spiral structure of galaxies According to W.A. Evans, writing in a 1969 edition of the Denbighshire Historical Society Transactions, Mr Roberts became a Sunday School teacher and "made strenuous efforts to make up for his early lack of education by attending the Liverpool Mechanics Institute classes in geology, chemistry, electricity and astronomy". Royal Astronomical Society Isaac Roberts built and observatory in Merseyside, capable of reaching into deep space His early scientific interests were closely related to his profession in the construction industry, presenting geological papers on the drainage of water through sandstone and the difficulties of building on these surfaces. However, as he established himself as a master builder, he gradually found himself with more time to pursue his loftier ambitions. His Rock Ferry observatory near Birkenhead was equipped with a telescope containing a 20" reflecting mirror made from glass-coated silver, mounted with a 7" refractor as a tracking scope, attached to a camera which produced images on glass plates. While these components were bought in from other manufacturers, it was a device purely of his own invention which made his photos of the night sky stand out from those which had gone before. Evans wrote: "The important innovation was a clockwork mechanism which could keep the telescope sighted at the same point in the night sky for 105 minutes. "This was a most intricate mechanism and resulted in far more accurate observations. The photographs obtained by this method of sighting showed 1,270 stars in the North Pole cluster, compared to the 38 in previous photographs." The 105 minutes was the key figure, as this was the amount of time it took for photographic images to be exposed onto the glass panels available to Mr Roberts at the time. Stephen Eales, professor of astronomy at Cardiff University, said this contraption was the first to solve a problem which scientists still wrestle with to this day. "The advantage of photography over the naked eye is that light can accumulate on film over time, allowing objects to be seen in far more detail than in just one snapshot. "However the down side is that the Earth is rotating so quickly that in a matter of seconds you will have lost your focus on the target. "Nowadays telescopes are programmed by computer to counteract the Earth's rotation, but to have come up with a mechanical solution to this problem so early was revolutionary." Cardiff University/European Space Agency In 2010 Prof Eales' team built a camera onboard the William Herschel Space Observatory, which captured the very same image as Isaac Roberts had 122 years before. The observatory - in Earth's orbit, four times more distant than the moon - only lasted from 2009 - 2013, before the helium cylinders required to cool it to near absolute zero ran out Prof Eales first became interested in Mr Roberts when writing his own book The Ghost in The Telescope, on how his team had observed the same Andromeda Galaxy through the William Herschel Space Observatory in 2010. "We were investigating Andromeda in the submillimetre waveband, between infrared and radio waves - that allowed us to see what causes the dark lines visible in Roberts' photos, which many had written off as imperfections in his exposure. "In the visible wavelengths you can only see a 'stellar bulge' of old stars, but the newly-born stars are masked by interstellar dust." Prof Eales likened it to looking at a bonfire through its smoke. "The new stars are there, glowing blue as opposed to the older stars' red, but Isaac couldn't picture them because they were masked by the 'smoke' of their creation. We were able to prove their existence by measuring the tiny difference in radiation between the dark lines Isaac photographed and the space around them." Science Museum, London Installed first at his home near Liverpool, Roberts' telescope was later moved to the less smoky skies of Crowborogh, Sussex Prof Eales believes it was the collision of photography and astronomy during the late 19th Century which made this all possible. "People had been staring into space for centuries, but without a means of recording what they'd seen, it was impossible to cross-check their findings. "Isaac, along with Edward Emerson Barnard in America, were amongst the first to put the disciplines together. "Barnard was a brilliant self-taught photographer who'd been forced into work at the age of six through poverty, and Isaac had mastery of the skies. It was by people like this coming together and sharing their knowhow that we have the foundations upon which research like ours with the William Herschel Space Observatory were built." Cambridge University Press Roberts' 'Starfield' home, where he lived cheek by jowl with Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, but did he ever detect the dog who barked in the night? Shortly after his groundbreaking 1888 photograph Roberts relocated to Sussex to escape Liverpool's pollution; partly owing to his chronic bronchitis, and partly in search of clearer skies. In the village of Crowborough he would almost certainly have rubbed shoulders with neighbour Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, though no documentary evidence has been found that the two were familiar. In 1896 he was a member of the party who went to Vadso in Norway to observe the total eclipse of the sun, where he met his future second wife Dr Dorothea Klumpke of the Paris Observatory. Roberts-Klumpke Trust 32 years his his junior, Dorothea was by Roberts' side throughout the latter years of his life, from 1896 to 1904
summary_src:
Isaac Roberts, a 19th-century builder and self-taught astronomer, is celebrated for capturing the first clear photograph of the Andromeda galaxy in 1888. His groundbreaking work also demonstrated the spiral structure of galaxies, a significant advancement in astronomy.

Roberts, who compensated for an early lack of formal education through self-study, achieved this through his innovative clockwork mechanism. Integrated into his observatory's telescope in Rock Ferry, Merseyside, this device allowed the telescope to track the night sky for up to 105 minutes, enabling long photographic exposures on glass panels. This technique accumulated light, revealing far more celestial detail, such as 1,270 stars in the North Pole cluster compared to previous methods' 38.

Experts like Professor Stephen Eales of Cardiff University highlight Roberts' mechanism as revolutionary, solving the persistent problem of Earth's rotation in astrophotography long before computer-controlled telescopes existed. Roberts essentially merged the nascent fields of photography and astronomy, laying foundations for future research. In 2010, Professor Eales' team even used the William Herschel Space Observatory to replicate Roberts' Andromeda image, studying the 'dark lines' (interstellar dust masking new stars) that Roberts' photographs revealed but couldn't fully explain.

Roberts later moved from Liverpool due to chronic bronchitis and pollution to Crowborough, Sussex, seeking clearer skies, where he was a neighbour to Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. He met his second wife, Dr. Dorothea Klumpke of the Paris Observatory, during a solar eclipse observation in Norway.

यहाँ अंग्रेजी समाचार सारांश का हिंदी अनुवाद है:

आइजैक रॉबर्ट्स, जो 19वीं सदी के एक बिल्डर और स्व-शिक्षित खगोलशास्त्री थे, को 1888 में एंड्रोमेडा आकाशगंगा की पहली स्पष्ट तस्वीर खींचने के लिए जाना जाता है। उनके इस अभूतपूर्व कार्य ने आकाशगंगाओं की सर्पिल संरचना को भी प्रदर्शित किया, जो खगोल विज्ञान में एक महत्वपूर्ण प्रगति थी।

औपचारिक शिक्षा की प्रारंभिक कमी को स्व-अध्ययन से पूरा करते हुए, रॉबर्ट्स ने यह उपलब्धि अपने अभिनव घड़ीनुमा यांत्रिक तंत्र के माध्यम से हासिल की। मर्सीसाइड के रॉक फेरी में स्थित उनकी वेधशाला के दूरबीन में एकीकृत, इस उपकरण ने दूरबीन को 105 मिनट तक रात के आकाश को ट्रैक करने की अनुमति दी। इससे कांच के पैनल पर लंबी फोटोग्राफिक एक्सपोजर लेना संभव हो पाया। इस तकनीक से प्रकाश संचित होता गया, जिसने कहीं अधिक खगोलीय विवरण उजागर किए, जैसे कि उत्तरी ध्रुव क्लस्टर में 1,270 तारे, जबकि पिछली विधियों से केवल 38 ही दिखाई देते थे।

कार्डिफ विश्वविद्यालय के प्रोफेसर स्टीफन ईल्स जैसे विशेषज्ञ रॉबर्ट्स के तंत्र को क्रांतिकारी बताते हैं, जिसने कंप्यूटर-नियंत्रित दूरबीनों के अस्तित्व में आने से बहुत पहले ही खगोल-फोटोग्राफी में पृथ्वी के घूर्णन की लगातार बनी रहने वाली समस्या का समाधान कर दिया था। रॉबर्ट्स ने मूल रूप से फोटोग्राफी और खगोल विज्ञान के उभरते हुए क्षेत्रों का विलय किया, जिससे भविष्य के अनुसंधान के लिए नींव पड़ी। 2010 में, प्रोफेसर ईल्स की टीम ने विलियम हर्शेल स्पेस ऑब्जर्वेटरी का उपयोग करके रॉबर्ट्स की एंड्रोमेडा छवि को दोहराया और उन 'गहरी रेखाओं' (अंतरतारकीय धूल जो नए तारों को छिपाती है) का अध्ययन किया, जिन्हें रॉबर्ट्स की तस्वीरों ने उजागर किया था लेकिन वे पूरी तरह से समझा नहीं पाए थे।

बाद में, पुरानी ब्रोंकाइटिस और प्रदूषण के कारण रॉबर्ट्स लिवरपूल से क्रोबोरो, ससेक्स चले गए, स्वच्छ आकाश की तलाश में, जहां वे सर आर्थर कोनन डॉयल के पड़ोसी थे। उन्होंने अपनी दूसरी पत्नी, पेरिस वेधशाला की डॉ. डोरोथिया क्लुम्प्के से नॉर्वे में एक सूर्य ग्रहण के अवलोकन के दौरान मुलाकात की।
