title_src: T20 Blast final: Will Smeed takes Somerset to victory over Hampshire
text_src: Somerset can now proudly claim to be the team to beat in T20 cricket in England having made three finals in a row, winning two of them. Following their 2023 victory over Essex it was a different story last season as they suffered an eight-wicket thrashing at the hands of Gloucestershire. They appeared to be struggling to keep up with the required run-rate of almost 10 per over this time around before Smeed and Dickson turned the game on its head with a fourth-wicket stand of 88. Smeed and Tom Kohler-Cadmore, who made an outstanding 81 in their semi-final win over Lancashire, had got Somerset off to a lightning start, taking them to 46-0 in the fifth over when Kohler-Cadmore was bowled by Sonny Baker's rapid yorker. On a day where 44 sixes were struck, Kohler-Cadmore hit the biggest of them all when he swiped Chris Wood over the Eric Hollies Stand. But a couple of overs later he was gone as young England paceman Baker yorked him with an 88mph beauty. At 89-3 in the 10th over, the game was in the balance but Smeed continued to find boundaries, hitting 14 fours and a six in total. Perhaps the crucial moment came in the 14th over when Scott Currie dropped Dickson on the boundary with the required run-rate above 12 an over. Smeed chipped Currie to James Vince on the long-off boundary six short of a deserved century to give Hampshire hope before Gregory ended it in the same over with a four and a couple of leg-side sixes. "The ball seems to fly here especially under the lights and the dew comes in so we always knew we had a chance," Smeed told BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra. "It was some proper hitting from Lewis [Gregory] at the end there as well. "The guys have been unbelievable in the whole competition, different people have stood up in different games. "I think that's probably our strength, we've got match winners one to 11 and if it's someone's day they can get us over the line."
summary_src:
Somerset has firmly established itself as a leading power in English T20 cricket, reaching three consecutive finals and winning two. In a recent thrilling encounter, they clinched a dramatic victory against Hampshire, bouncing back from an eight-wicket thrashing by Gloucestershire last season.

Despite a rapid start from Smeed and Tom Kohler-Cadmore, both were dismissed by Sonny Baker's quick yorkers. With the score at 89-3 in the 10th over and the required run-rate climbing towards 10 per over, the game hung in the balance. Smeed and Dickson then forged a crucial 88-run fourth-wicket partnership, a stand made even more significant when Scott Currie dropped Dickson on the boundary.

Smeed, who struck 14 fours and a six, fell just six runs short of a deserved century. However, Lewis Gregory dramatically sealed the win in the same over with a boundary and two leg-side sixes. Post-match, Smeed credited the conditions, stating, "The ball seems to fly here especially under the lights and the dew comes in so we always knew we had a chance," and praised Gregory's "proper hitting" for securing the victory.
summary_tgt:
यहां इंग्लिश न्यूज़ समरी का हिंदी अनुवाद है:

**समरसेट ने इंग्लिश टी20 क्रिकेट में खुद को एक अग्रणी शक्ति के रूप में मज़बूती से स्थापित किया है, लगातार तीन फाइनल में पहुंचकर दो खिताब अपने नाम किए हैं। हाल ही के एक रोमांचक मुकाबले में, उन्होंने हैम्पशायर के खिलाफ एक नाटकीय जीत दर्ज की, पिछले सीज़न में ग्लोस्टरशायर से मिली आठ विकेट की करारी हार के बाद शानदार वापसी करते हुए।**

**स्मीड और टॉम कोहलर-कैडमोर की तेज़ शुरुआत के बावजूद, सन्नी बेकर की सटीक यॉर्कर गेंदों ने दोनों को पवेलियन भेज दिया। 10वें ओवर में 89-3 के स्कोर पर और आवश्यक रन-रेट 10 रन प्रति ओवर की ओर बढ़ता जा रहा था, तब मैच पूरी तरह से अधर में लटक गया था। इसके बाद स्मीड और डिक्सन ने चौथे विकेट के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण 88 रन की साझेदारी की, जो तब और भी अहम हो गई जब स्कॉट करी ने बाउंड्री पर डिक्सन का आसान कैच टपका दिया।**

**स्मीड, जिन्होंने 14 चौके और एक छक्का लगाया, अपने शानदार शतक से सिर्फ छह रन दूर रह गए। हालांकि, लुईस ग्रेगरी ने उसी ओवर में एक चौका और लेग-साइड पर दो छक्के जड़कर नाटकीय अंदाज़ में जीत पर मुहर लगा दी। मैच के बाद, स्मीड ने जीत का श्रेय परिस्थितियों को देते हुए कहा, "यहां गेंद हवा में उड़ती है, खासकर लाइट्स के नीचे और ओस भी आती है, इसलिए हम हमेशा जानते थे कि हमारे पास मौका है।" उन्होंने जीत सुनिश्चित करने के लिए ग्रेगरी की "ज़बरदस्त बल्लेबाज़ी" की भी प्रशंसा की।**
meta_description: Will Smeed's magnificent 94 helps Somerset to their third T20 Blast title with a six-wicket victory over Hampshire.

author: ['Mike Henson']
title_src: Ollie Lawrence in England squad for training camp before Autumn Internationals
text_src: Lawrence, who has documented his recovery, including time spent in an oxygen-rich hyperbaric chamber, on social media,, external came off the bench in Bath's 28-28 draw against Munster in a pre-season friendly on Friday. Former captain Owen Farrell, who has returned to Saracens from Racing 92 and back into England eligibility, has been left out. Northampton pair Fraser Dingwall and George Furbank have also recovered from injury to take part in the camp, which begins on Sunday. Captain Maro Itoje will sit out training as he goes through a managed return from a concussion suffered in the final Lions Test on 2 August. Immanuel Feyi-Waboso, who missed most of the latter half of last season with a shoulder issue, and prop Will Stuart have minor complaints that will keep them on the sidelines. Seb Atkinson and Guy Pepper, who impressed on Test debut in the summer's series win over Argentina, are included, alongside returning Lions players Ellis Genge, Tommy Freeman, Alex Mitchell, Fin Smith, Marcus Smith and Henry Pollock. Midfielder Henry Slade, forced out of the summer tour by a hand injury, also features. There is no place for Harlequins number eight Alex Dombrandt, Bath centre Max Ojomoh or Bristol scrum-half Harry Randall. Hooker Theo Dan, who lost his central contract this summer, is overlooked in favour of Leicester's Jamie Blamire, with Luke Cowan-Dickie and Jamie George included. Second row George Martin, who has not played since February because of knee and shoulder injuries, is still not available. England's autumn campaign begins against Australia on 1 November, before matches against Fiji, New Zealand and Argentina.
summary_src:
England's upcoming squad camp, commencing Sunday, sees a mix of returning players and new inclusions, while several key figures are either sidelined or omitted.

Notable inclusions feature Seb Atkinson and Guy Pepper, who impressed against Argentina, alongside Ellis Genge, Tommy Freeman, Alex Mitchell, Fin Smith, Marcus Smith, and Henry Pollock. Midfielder Henry Slade returns after recovering from a hand injury, expected to be fully fit for the final game of the tour. Hookers Luke Cowan-Dickie, Jamie George, and Leicester's Jamie Blamire are named, with Theo Dan overlooked.

On the injury front, Fraser Dingwall and George Furbank have recovered and will participate. Captain Maro Itoje will undergo a managed return from a concussion, sitting out initial training sessions. Meanwhile, Immanuel Feyi-Waboso is out with a shoulder issue, and Will Stuart is sidelined with minor complaints. Second row George Martin remains unavailable due to knee and shoulder injuries and will miss the match against Scotland on Saturday. Lawrence, who has documented his recovery, notably featured in a recent friendly.

Significantly, former captain Owen Farrell has been left out of the England squad for the Six Nations following his return to Saracens. Other notable omissions include Harlequins' number eight Alex Dombrandt, Bath centre Max Ojomoh, and Bristol scrum-half Harry Randall.

England's autumn campaign is set to begin on November 1 against Australia, followed by matches against Fiji, New Zealand, and Argentina in their subsequent five fixtures.
summary_tgt:
**इंग्लैंड के आगामी स्क्वॉड शिविर रविवार से शुरू हो रहा है, जिसमें लौटते खिलाड़ियों और नए चेहरों का मिश्रण देखने को मिलेगा। वहीं, कई प्रमुख खिलाड़ियों को या तो चोट के कारण बाहर रखा गया है या टीम में शामिल नहीं किया गया है।**

उल्लेखनीय शामिल खिलाड़ियों में सेब एटकिंसन और गाय पेपर शामिल हैं, जिन्होंने अर्जेंटीना के खिलाफ प्रभावशाली प्रदर्शन किया था। उनके साथ-साथ एलिस गेंज, टॉमी फ्रीमैन, एलेक्स मिशेल, फिन स्मिथ, मार्कस स्मिथ और हेनरी पोलॉक को भी टीम में जगह मिली है। हाथ की चोट से उबरने के बाद मिडफील्डर हेनरी स्लेड की वापसी हुई है, और उम्मीद है कि वह दौरे के अंतिम मैच के लिए पूरी तरह फिट होंगे। हुकर के रूप में ल्यूक कोवान-डिकी, जेमी जॉर्ज और लीसेस्टर के जेमी ब्लैमिर को चुना गया है, जबकि थियो डैन को नजरअंदाज किया गया है।

चोटों की बात करें तो, फ्रेज़र डिंगवॉल और जॉर्ज फर्बैंक ठीक हो गए हैं और शिविर में भाग लेंगे। कप्तान मारो इटोजे कनकशन से उबरने के बाद चरणबद्ध तरीके से वापसी करेंगे और शुरुआती प्रशिक्षण सत्रों में हिस्सा नहीं लेंगे। इस बीच, इमानुएल फेयी-वाबासो कंधे की समस्या के कारण बाहर हैं, और विल स्टुअर्ट को भी मामूली चोटों के कारण बाहर रखा गया है। दूसरी पंक्ति के खिलाड़ी जॉर्ज मार्टिन घुटने और कंधे की चोटों के कारण अभी भी अनुपलब्ध हैं और शनिवार को स्कॉटलैंड के खिलाफ होने वाला मैच नहीं खेल पाएंगे। अपनी रिकवरी का दस्तावेजीकरण करने वाले लॉरेंस हाल ही के एक दोस्ताना मैच में उल्लेखनीय रूप से शामिल हुए थे।

गौरतलब है कि पूर्व कप्तान ओवेन फैरेल को सारसेंस में उनकी वापसी के बाद सिक्स नेशंस के लिए इंग्लैंड टीम से बाहर रखा गया है। अन्य प्रमुख खिलाड़ियों में जिन्हें जगह नहीं मिली है, उनमें हारलेक्विन्स के नंबर आठ एलेक्स डोम्ब्रांड्ट, बाथ के सेंटर मैक्स ओजोमोह और ब्रिस्टल के स्क्राम-हाफ हैरी रैंडल शामिल हैं।

इंग्लैंड का शरद ऋतु अभियान 1 नवंबर को ऑस्ट्रेलिया के खिलाफ शुरू होगा, जिसके बाद उनके अगले पांच मुकाबलों में फिजी, न्यूजीलैंड और अर्जेंटीना से भी मैच खेले जाएंगे।
meta_description: Bath centre Ollie Lawrence returns to the England fold for a training camp to prepare for the Autumn Internationals.

title_src: Canelo vs Crawford: Tony Bellew, Ryan Garcia and Jake Paul on Terence Crawford win
text_src: Terence Crawford is among the "boxing gods" after his masterclass against Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez in Las Vegas, says former world champion Tony Bellew. Crawford, 37, moved up two weight classes to dethrone the undisputed super-middleweight champion by unanimous decision in Las Vegas. The American is the first male boxer to become undisputed champion in three weight classes in the modern era. He extended his undefeated record to 42 fights and his consecutive world title run to 20. "Wow, just wow," British ex-cruiserweight world champion Bellew wrote on X., external
summary_src: Terence Crawford solidified his place among boxing's all-time greats with a masterclass performance, defeating Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez by unanimous decision in Las Vegas. The 37-year-old American made history by moving up two weight classes to dethrone the undisputed super-middleweight champion. This landmark victory makes Crawford the first male boxer in the modern era to become an undisputed champion in three different weight divisions, and the first man ever to win world titles in three separate weight classes. He also extended his remarkable undefeated record to 42 fights. Former world champion Tony Bellew lauded the achievement, declaring Crawford one of the "boxing gods" after his dominant display.
summary_tgt:
टेरेंस क्रॉफर्ड ने लास वेगास में साउल 'कैनेलो' अल्वारेज़ को सर्वसम्मत निर्णय से हराकर अपने शानदार प्रदर्शन के साथ मुक्केबाजी के सर्वकालिक महान खिलाड़ियों में अपनी जगह पक्की कर ली है। 37 वर्षीय अमेरिकी ने निर्विवाद सुपर-मिडिलवेट चैंपियन को गद्दी से हटाने के लिए दो वजन वर्गों में ऊपर चढ़कर इतिहास रच दिया।

यह ऐतिहासिक जीत क्रॉफर्ड को आधुनिक युग का पहला पुरुष मुक्केबाज बनाती है, जो तीन अलग-अलग वजन वर्गों में निर्विवाद चैंपियन बना। इसके साथ ही, वह तीन अलग-अलग वजन वर्गों में विश्व खिताब जीतने वाले पहले व्यक्ति भी बन गए हैं। उन्होंने अपने उल्लेखनीय अपराजित रिकॉर्ड को 42 फाइट तक बढ़ा दिया है।

पूर्व विश्व चैंपियन टोनी बेलेव ने उनके प्रभावशाली प्रदर्शन के बाद इस उपलब्धि की सराहना की और क्रॉफर्ड को 'मुक्केबाजी के देवताओं' में से एक घोषित किया।
meta_description: Tony Bellew, Ryan Garcia and Jake Paul react to Terence Crawford's historic win over Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez in Las Vegas.

title_src: Newcastle United: Nick Woltemade shows there is life without Isak despite Wissa injury blow
text_src: Twenty-nine minutes. That's all Nick Woltemade needed. Not only to open his account for Newcastle United – but to be serenaded with his own chant after scoring on his debut against Wolves. Woltemade went on to receive a standing ovation after the record signing came off midway through the second half of his side's 1-0 win. His contribution was certainly timely as it was revealed post match that fellow new striker signing Yoane Wissa is likely to be out until after the next international break in October. It is remarkable to think Woltemade only had a handful of training sessions with his new team-mates before his first appearance. You would not necessarily have known it as he was pushed in front of the Gallowgate End by Joelinton to take the acclaim of the crowd after the game. "I was just here for four days now, so everything was new for me," he told BBC Final Score. "I was putting that bit away and I was focusing on myself today. "I think the coach already gave me such a good feeling, so I felt good on the pitch. I knew what to do and I guess you saw today everybody knew what they have to do."
summary_src:
Newcastle United's record signing, Nick Woltemade, made an immediate impact by scoring the winning goal on his debut against Wolves in a 1-0 victory. His exceptional performance earned him a unique chant and a standing ovation, solidifying his status as the "man of the moment."

Woltemade's timely contribution is especially crucial as fellow new striker Yoane Wissa is expected to be sidelined until after the October international break. Despite having joined the team only a few days prior and completing just a handful of training sessions, Woltemade quickly adapted, crediting his coach for making him feel comfortable and confident on the pitch.
summary_tgt:
न्यूकैसल यूनाइटेड के रिकॉर्ड करार वाले खिलाड़ी, निक वोल्तेमेडे ने अपने डेब्यू मैच में ही भेड़ियों (Wolves) के खिलाफ 1-0 की जीत में निर्णायक गोल दागकर तत्काल प्रभाव डाला। उनके असाधारण प्रदर्शन ने उन्हें एक अनोखा नारा और स्टैंडिंग ओवेशन दिलाया, जिससे वह 'फिलहाल के हीरो' के रूप में स्थापित हो गए।

वोल्तेमेडे का यह समय पर दिया गया योगदान विशेष रूप से महत्वपूर्ण है, क्योंकि उनके साथी नए स्ट्राइकर योएन विस्सा के अक्टूबर के अंतरराष्ट्रीय ब्रेक के बाद तक मैदान से बाहर रहने की उम्मीद है। टीम में कुछ ही दिन पहले शामिल होने और केवल मुट्ठी भर प्रशिक्षण सत्र पूरे करने के बावजूद, वोल्तेमेडे ने तेजी से खुद को ढाला। उन्होंने अपने कोच को इसका श्रेय दिया, जिन्होंने उन्हें मैदान पर सहज और आत्मविश्वासी महसूस कराया।
meta_description: Some players wait a long time to get their own chant - Nick Woltemade managed it at Newcastle United in all of 29 minutes.

title_src: Procore Championship: Scottie Scheffler shoots 64 to go third as Ben Griffin leads
text_src: Scheffler stormed from 14th overnight into third with 10 birdies - five on the front nine and five on the back. He was denied a share of the lead only after a chip into a bunker on the par-four 14th led to a double bogey. Scheffler shot 70 in the first round, which ended his run of 21 successive sub-70 scores, and 68 in the second. "There's definitely some tricks to this golf course, things you've got to get used to," he said. "There are things that are hard to notice in the practice rounds. But when you start playing under tournament conditions you start seeing a little of those nuances." US Open champion JJ Spaun and Russell Henley are best placed of the remaining eight Ryder Cup players on nine under. Griffin, a captain's pick who will make his debut at the Ryder Cup, said: "I've got to have that chasing mindset as a leader because I know all those guys behind me are going to stay aggressive and I've got to do everything I can to stay in front."
summary_src: Scottie Scheffler made a significant move from 14th to third place, carding ten birdies, but a double bogey on the 14th denied him a share of the lead. He shot 70 in the first round, ending a streak of 21 successive sub-70 scores, and 68 in the second, noting the course's subtle challenges become apparent only under tournament conditions. Among other competitors, US Open champion JJ Spaun and Russell Henley lead the remaining eight Ryder Cup players at nine under, with Spaun on course for his first Ryder Cup win. Captain's pick Griffin, preparing for his Ryder Cup debut, emphasized the need for a "chasing mindset as a leader."
summary_tgt:
स्कॉटी शेफलर ने 14वें स्थान से तीसरे स्थान पर जबरदस्त छलांग लगाई, दस बर्डी बनाए, लेकिन 14वें होल पर एक डबल बोगी के कारण वे संयुक्त बढ़त हासिल करने से चूक गए। उन्होंने पहले दौर में 70 का स्कोर किया, जिससे उनके लगातार 21 सब-70 स्कोर का सिलसिला टूट गया, और दूसरे में 68 का स्कोर किया। उन्होंने कहा कि कोर्स की सूक्ष्म चुनौतियाँ केवल टूर्नामेंट की परिस्थितियों में ही सामने आती हैं।

अन्य प्रतिस्पर्धियों में, यूएस ओपन चैंपियन जेजे स्पॉन और रसेल हेनले नौ अंडर के स्कोर के साथ शेष आठ राइडर कप खिलाड़ियों का नेतृत्व कर रहे हैं। स्पॉन अपनी पहली राइडर कप जीत की ओर अग्रसर हैं। कप्तान द्वारा चुने गए ग्रिफिन, जो अपने राइडर कप पदार्पण की तैयारी कर रहे हैं, ने एक लीडर के तौर पर 'लक्ष्य का पीछा करने की मानसिकता' (chasing mindset) की आवश्यकता पर जोर दिया।
meta_description: World number one Scottie Scheffler moves to within two shots of leader and US Ryder Cup team-mate Ben Griffin in the Procore Championship.

title_src: Football gossip: Olise, Maignan, Guehi, Silva, Bouaddi, Williams, Fofana
text_src: Bayern Munich set a £100m price for Liverpool target Michael Olise, Chelsea could move for Marc Guehi and Mike Maignan on free transfers next summer, while Juventus are keen on Manchester City midfielder Bernardo Silva. Bayern Munich have priced 23-year-old France midfielder Michael Olise at £100m amid interest from Liverpool and other top European clubs. summary_src:

Bayern Munich has priced Crystal Palace midfielder Michael Olise at £100m, attracting interest from Liverpool and other major European clubs. Bayern are also reportedly pursuing Athletic Bilbao winger Nico Williams, available on a free transfer next summer, and are in competition with Chelsea for Lyon's Malick Fofana. summary_tgt:
यहां अंग्रेजी समाचार सारांश का हिंदी अनुवाद दिया गया है:

**फुटबॉल ट्रांसफर बाजार: प्रमुख क्लबों की हलचल**

बायर्न म्यूनिख ने क्रिस्टल पैलेस के मिडफील्डर माइकल ओलिसे की कीमत 100 मिलियन पाउंड निर्धारित की है, जिस पर लिवरपूल और अन्य प्रमुख यूरोपीय क्लबों की नज़र है। बायर्न अगले साल गर्मियों में मुफ्त ट्रांसफर पर उपलब्ध होने वाले एथलेटिक बिलबाओ के विंगर निको विलियम्स को भी हासिल करना चाहता है। इसके अलावा, वे ल्योन के मलिक फोफाना के लिए चेल्सी के साथ प्रतिस्पर्धा कर रहे हैं। बायर्न का नाम चेल्सी के डिएगो कोस्टा से भी जोड़ा जा रहा है।

चेल्सी की अगले साल गर्मियों की ट्रांसफर योजनाओं में क्रिस्टल पैलेस के डिफेंडर मार्क गुही और एसी मिलान के गोलकीपर माइक मेगनन को मुफ्त ट्रांसफर पर हासिल करना शामिल है। वे जुवेंटस के फॉरवर्ड केनान यिल्डिज़ पर भी नज़र रख रहे हैं।

मैनचेस्टर सिटी के बर्नाडो सिल्वा के अगले साल गर्मियों में मुफ्त ट्रांसफर पर जाने की उम्मीद है क्योंकि उनके अनुबंध का नवीनीकरण होने की संभावना नहीं है। जुवेंटस और बेनफिका ने उनमें रुचि व्यक्त की है।

लिवरपूल को डिफेंडर इब्राहिमा कोनाटे के जाने का सामना करना पड़ेगा, जिन्होंने अनुबंध नवीनीकरण से इनकार कर दिया है और अगले साल गर्मियों में रियल मैड्रिड में शामिल होंगे। लिवरपूल, आर्सेनल और मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड तीनों लिले के युवा मिडफील्डर अय्यूब बौआदी में गहरी रुचि रखते हैं।

मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड ब्राइटन के मिडफील्डर कार्लोस बालेबा में भी अपनी रुचि बनाए हुए है। वहीं, विंगर सैम मेथर ने जनवरी में टीम छोड़ने का अनुरोध किया है, क्योंकि काइसेरिस्पोर जाने का उनका सौदा विफल हो गया था।
meta_description: Bayern Munich set a £100m price for Liverpool target Michael Olise, Chelsea could move for Marc Guehi and Mike Maignan next summer, Juventus are keen on Bernardo Silva, plus more.

title_src: Lewis Crocker: 'You witnessed a kid who changed his life tonight' - Belfast fighter on world title win
text_src: Lewis Crocker strutted into the biggest night of his life with a chip on his shoulder. For six months, he had stewed on his first encounter with Paddy Donovan. Amid the brouhaha that followed a wild night inside Belfast's SSE Arena, it was easy to forget that Crocker had won. Only it didn't feel like it. Sub-par on the night, Crocker was outfought by the all-action Limerick southpaw, but still left with a 'W' next to his name after Donovan was disqualified for landing a blow after the bell at the end of the eighth round. When the inevitable rematch was confirmed, Donovan was installed as the favourite. It did not escape Crocker's notice. And so, within seconds of becoming Belfast's latest world champion via a split decision win at a raucous Windsor Park on Saturday night, Crocker was keen to get his point across when a DAZN microphone was thrust under his chin. "Nobody gave me a chance in this fight, nobody," said the new IBF welterweight champion. "But I want to say all the people who gave me stick after the last fight, when you write your post tomorrow make sure you write 'Lewis Crocker world champion!'" Later, in the calmer surroundings of his post-fight press conference, Crocker added: "Paddy's a great fighter. I saw articles in the build-up saying he could be the greatest Irish fighter of all time. "That's how much people were building this guy up, and nobody was giving me a chance, so it was good to prove people wrong."
summary_src:
Lewis Crocker secured the IBF welterweight championship by defeating Paddy Donovan in a highly anticipated rematch, triumphing via split decision. The victory followed their initial controversial encounter, where Crocker won by disqualification after Donovan landed a late blow, despite Crocker feeling outfought.

Donovan was subsequently installed as the favourite for the rematch, with some pundits hailing him as a future "greatest Irish fighter." Crocker, feeling underestimated and that "nobody gave me a chance," used this as motivation. After his championship win, Crocker directly addressed his critics, proclaiming, "When you write your post tomorrow make sure you write 'Lewis Crocker world champion!'" Despite the intense rivalry, Crocker also expressed respect for Donovan, calling him "a great fighter" and a friend.
summary_tgt:
लुईस क्रॉकर ने एक बहुप्रतीक्षित रीमैच में पैडी डोनोवन को स्प्लिट डिसीजन से हराकर IBF वेल्टरवेट चैंपियनशिप अपने नाम कर ली है।

यह जीत उनके पहले के विवादास्पद मुकाबले के बाद मिली है। उस मुकाबले में, डोनोवन द्वारा देर से मुक्का मारने के कारण क्रॉकर को अयोग्यता (डिस्क्वालिफिकेशन) से विजेता घोषित किया गया था, हालांकि क्रॉकर को खुद लगा था कि वे मुकाबले में मात खा गए थे।

इसी वजह से, डोनोवन को रीमैच के लिए पसंदीदा माना जाने लगा था, कुछ खेल पंडितों ने तो उन्हें भविष्य का 'महानतम आयरिश फाइटर' तक करार दिया था। खुद को कम आंका जाने और 'मुझे किसी ने मौका नहीं दिया' जैसी भावनाओं को क्रॉकर ने अपनी प्रेरणा बनाया।

चैंपियनशिप जीतने के बाद, क्रॉकर ने सीधे अपने आलोचकों को संबोधित करते हुए कहा, "जब आप कल अपनी पोस्ट लिखें, तो सुनिश्चित करें कि आप लिखें 'लुईस क्रॉकर विश्व चैंपियन!'" इस तीव्र प्रतिद्वंद्विता के बावजूद, क्रॉकर ने डोनोवन के प्रति सम्मान भी व्यक्त किया, उन्हें "एक महान फाइटर" और दोस्त बताया।
meta_description: Lewis Crocker savours the satisfaction of proving doubters wrong by becoming a world champion on home soil with victory over Paddy Donovan at Windsor Park.

title_src: Anthony Martial joins Monterrey from AEK Athens
text_src: Martial became the world's most expensive teenage footballer when United paid Monaco £36m to sign him in 2015. The France international has missed AEK's past seven games and last featured in a 1-0 win over Hapoel Be'er Sheva in the second qualifying round of the Conference League in July. Legendary former Spain and Real Madrid defender Sergio Ramos joined Monterrey in February. They are second in the table and play second-bottom Querataro on Monday at 00:00 BST.
summary_src: Anthony Martial, Manchester United's record-breaking teenage signing in 2015 for £36m, has become an influential Premier League player. However, the France international has missed AEK's last seven games, last playing in July. Separately, legendary former Spain and Real Madrid defender Sergio Ramos joined Monterrey in February after being released by Real Madrid. Additionally, an unidentified team, currently second in their league table, is set to play second-bottom Queretaro on Monday at 00:00 BST.
summary_tgt:
यहां अंग्रेजी समाचार सारांश का हिंदी अनुवाद है:

एंथोनी मार्शल, जो मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड के 2015 में 36 मिलियन पाउंड के रिकॉर्ड-तोड़ किशोर साइनिंग थे, एक प्रभावशाली प्रीमियर लीग खिलाड़ी बन गए हैं। हालांकि, फ्रांस के इस अंतर्राष्ट्रीय खिलाड़ी ने AEK के पिछले सात मैच नहीं खेले हैं, और वह आखिरी बार जुलाई में मैदान पर उतरे थे।

अलग से, स्पेन और रियल मैड्रिड के दिग्गज पूर्व डिफेंडर सर्जियो रामोस, रियल मैड्रिड द्वारा रिलीज़ किए जाने के बाद फरवरी में मॉन्टेरे से जुड़े।

इसके अतिरिक्त, एक अज्ञात टीम, जो वर्तमान में अपनी लीग तालिका में दूसरे स्थान पर है, सोमवार को 00:00 BST पर तालिका में दूसरे सबसे नीचे स्थित क्वेरेटारो से भिड़ने वाली है।
meta_description: France forward Anthony Martial, once the world's most expensive teenage player, joins Mexican side Monterrey.

title_src: Graham Potter: Will West Ham manager get more time despite poor start?
text_src: For the second successive home game at London Stadium, West Ham have finished with many of their fans having left long before the final whistle. A 3-0 loss to Tottenham on Saturday was greeted by boos from those still inside the ground at full-time. Two defeats, eight goals conceded and just the solitary goal scored on home soil makes for miserable reading for manager Graham Potter that is only going to increase the pressure he is under. But afterwards, the former Chelsea boss remained defiant. "I understand because the scoreline is the scoreline and I understand why people are upset," he told Sky Sports. "We are a new team and we have to stick together and focus on the things we've done well and see where we can improve."
summary_src: Manager Graham Potter is under significant pressure following his team's dismal home form, which includes two defeats where they conceded eight goals and scored only once. Fans voiced their displeasure with boos after a 3-0 loss to Tottenham, a sentiment echoing broader fan dissatisfaction as West Ham supporters also left early during their 1-0 defeat to Manchester City. Despite the mounting pressure and fan anger, Potter remains defiant, vowing not to give up. He acknowledged the understandable frustration but urged his "new team" to unite and focus on improvement.
summary_tgt: **प्रबंधक ग्राहम पॉटर पर भारी दबाव है, क्योंकि उनकी टीम का घरेलू प्रदर्शन बेहद निराशाजनक रहा है। इसमें दो ऐसी हार शामिल हैं, जहाँ उनकी टीम ने आठ गोल खाए और केवल एक गोल कर पाई। टॉटनहैम से 3-0 की हार के बाद प्रशंसकों ने हूटिंग करके अपनी नाराजगी व्यक्त की। यह भावना व्यापक प्रशंसक असंतोष को दर्शाती है, क्योंकि मैनचेस्टर सिटी से 1-0 की हार के दौरान वेस्ट हैम के समर्थक भी मैच खत्म होने से पहले ही चले गए थे। बढ़ते दबाव और प्रशंसकों के गुस्से के बावजूद, पॉटर अडिग बने हुए हैं और उन्होंने हार न मानने का संकल्प लिया है। उन्होंने स्वाभाविक निराशा को स्वीकार किया, लेकिन अपनी "नई टीम" से एकजुट होकर सुधार पर ध्यान केंद्रित करने का आग्रह किया।**
meta_description: Two defeats, eight goals conceded and just the solitary goal scored on home soil makes miserable reading for Graham Potter that is only going to increase the pressure he is under at West Ham.

title_src: Russell Martin: Has Rangers boss lost backing of fans and board to turn tide?
text_src: "We'll see". That was the answer Rangers head coach Russell Martin gave when asked if he was certain his board would continue to support him given what was unfolding at Ibrox. It was far from convincing - and in stark contrast to his previous statements where certainty oozed out during what has now descended into a critical mess for the club. "Will you resign?" he was asked in his press conference, to which he responded with a firm "no," after a fan media representative explained an overwhelming amount of the Rangers support want him to leave. That exchange edged on hostile to say the least. This all came after enduring the quite venomous wrath of a majority of fans, with the 2-0 defeat at home by Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts leaving Martin's side 10th out of the 12 teams after five winless games. It's unthinkable for Rangers and a support given renewed, and long-awaited, hope of challenging Celtic earlier this year after a US-led consortium took control. Four draws and now this defeat is beyond a crisis given the demands of being in charge of the club. It's been 47 years since they failed to win any of their opening five league fixtures. You then chuck in a humiliating exit in the Champions League play-off to Club Brugge. The question now, after so much turmoil on and off the park since the former Southampton manager took charge in June, is whether he can turn this around or whether he will be given the opportunity to do so.
summary_src:
Rangers head coach Russell Martin is facing immense pressure and a growing crisis after a 2-0 home defeat to Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts, leaving his side 10th after five winless games. This unprecedented start marks the first time in 47 years Rangers have failed to win any of their opening five league fixtures, compounded by a humiliating Champions League play-off exit to Club Brugge.

Martin's position appears increasingly precarious, with his recent statements contrasting sharply with previous confidence. When questioned about board support, he gave an unconvincing "We'll see." Despite overwhelming fan calls for his departure, he firmly refused to resign, leading to a hostile exchange with a fan media representative during his press conference. The mounting "venomous wrath" from fans is particularly acute given renewed hope earlier this year after a US-led consortium took control.

With significant turmoil on and off the park since his June appointment, the central question now is whether Martin can successfully turn the club's fortunes around.
summary_tgt:
रेंजर्स के मुख्य कोच रसेल मार्टिन स्कॉटिश प्रीमियरशिप के लीडर्स हार्ट्स के हाथों घरेलू मैदान पर 2-0 से मिली हार के बाद भारी दबाव और बढ़ते संकट का सामना कर रहे हैं, जिससे उनकी टीम पाँच जीत-रहित मैचों के बाद 10वें स्थान पर आ गई है। यह अभूतपूर्व शुरुआत 47 वर्षों में पहली बार है जब रेंजर्स अपने शुरुआती पाँच लीग मुकाबलों में से कोई भी नहीं जीत पाए हैं, और क्लब ब्रुग के हाथों चैंपियंस लीग प्ले-ऑफ से अपमानजनक तरीके से बाहर होना इस स्थिति को और भी गंभीर बना देता है।

मार्टिन की स्थिति तेजी से अनिश्चित होती दिख रही है, क्योंकि उनके हालिया बयान पिछली आत्मविश्वास भरी बातों के बिल्कुल विपरीत हैं। बोर्ड के समर्थन के बारे में पूछे जाने पर, उन्होंने बेमन से "देखेंगे" कहकर एक अस्पष्ट जवाब दिया। प्रशंसकों द्वारा उनके इस्तीफे की भारी मांग के बावजूद, उन्होंने दृढ़ता से पद छोड़ने से इनकार कर दिया, जिसके कारण अपनी प्रेस कॉन्फ्रेंस के दौरान एक प्रशंसक मीडिया प्रतिनिधि के साथ उनकी तीखी बहस हुई। प्रशंसकों का बढ़ता "तीव्र आक्रोश" (venomous wrath) विशेष रूप से इसलिए तीखा है, क्योंकि इस साल की शुरुआत में एक अमेरिकी नेतृत्व वाले कंसोर्टियम द्वारा क्लब का नियंत्रण संभालने के बाद नई उम्मीद जगी थी।

जून में उनकी नियुक्ति के बाद से मैदान के अंदर और बाहर महत्वपूर्ण उथल-पुथल के साथ, अब केंद्रीय सवाल यह है कि क्या मार्टिन क्लब की किस्मत को सफलतापूर्वक बदल सकते हैं।
meta_description: BBC Scotland looks at the crisis facing Rangers head coach Russell Martin following defeat by Hearts.

title_src: NFL: Why Super Bowl revenge looks long shot for Kansas City Chiefs against Philadelphia Eagles
text_src: It's week two of the NFL season and after two thrilling games won by the Buffalo Bills and Pittsburgh Steelers last week, we now have a Super Bowl rematch. The NFL just knows how to create these match-ups. The Kansas City Chiefs host the Philadelphia Eagles on Sunday and this is going to be very interesting because it's definitely a revenge game. The Eagles beat the Chiefs 40-22 in the Super Bowl and nullified them till late in the third quarter. I think the biggest difference between the two teams is their roster. You look at the Eagles, they have Jalen Hurts, Saquon Barkley, AJ Brown. You can keep listing all these great players, and I just don't know who the Chiefs have any more. It's Patrick Mahomes... then what is that supporting cast? Rashee Rice is suspended for their first six games and Xavier Worthy suffered a shoulder injury as he and Travis Kelce ran into each other in last week's defeat by the Los Angeles Chargers in Brazil. That leaves Hollywood Brown and JuJu Smith-Schuster as the main receivers, which puts a lot of pressure on because the Chiefs' run game has not been terrific at all. The Chargers game was very much the Mahomes show. At one point, he had more carries than anybody else on the field. He put his body on the line multiple times - those hits add up, and you don't want to see your superstar quarterback risking his health so early in the season. Mahomes had six scrambles and the Chiefs only ran it 11 other times. Isiah Pacheco and Kareem Hunt combined for 41 yards with 10 of those carries, and that's just not sustainable. After the Eagles, the Chiefs face the New York Giants and then the Baltimore Ravens so, realistically, they could have a 1-3 record after four weeks. Baltimore is a huge game and with the Ravens losing to the Bills last week, they're going to have a lot to prove as well, to show that they want to be on top. The Eagles have a tough run defence, and the Giants have a good defence too, so I think that will be telling, to see how the Chiefs are able to run the ball. These two games stacked together, the Chiefs almost have to think about how they are going to prepare themselves to ensure they're firing on all cylinders for the Ravens. Last year, the Chiefs won so many one-score games, and they're going to have to be much better to do that again. They may be out for revenge against the Eagles but I don't think they have it in them... yet. Rashee Rice is a huge part of their offensive scheme and, without Worthy, they don't have any deep threat either so, I hate to say it, but I really struggle to see what they'll be able to do. I don't see what their answers are right now. In the off-season, the Chiefs lost Joe Thuney, who was huge for them on defence, but they did draft a left tackle in the first round, Josh Simmons, to help protect Mahomes more, and brought in another offensive tackle in Jaylon Moore, so they are doing the right things to create strength on the offensive line. They need to because the AFC West is the toughest it's been in a long time - none of it is given this year. The Chargers beat the Chiefs, the Las Vegas Raiders have got better and Bo Nix has only got stronger with the Denver Broncos. I still think the Chiefs will make the play-offs but if they carry on like this, I would be concerned.
summary_src:
This week's NFL schedule features several high-stakes Super Bowl rematches, notably the Buffalo Bills facing the Pittsburgh Steelers, who won their Super Bowl contest last year 24-21. However, the spotlight is heavily on Sunday's game between the Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles, a revenge match for the Chiefs after a 40-22 Super Bowl defeat to the Eagles in 2010.

The Chiefs enter this contest facing significant challenges, largely due to a depleted offensive supporting cast for quarterback Patrick Mahomes. Key receiver Rashee Rice is suspended for six games, and Xavier Worthy is sidelined with a shoulder injury, leaving limited reliable targets like Hollywood Brown and JuJu Smith-Schuster. This is compounded by a struggling run game, as evidenced by Isiah Pacheco and Kareem Hunt's combined 41 yards on 10 carries in their recent loss to the Los Angeles Chargers.

In that Chargers game—the Chiefs' first win against them since 2002—Mahomes was forced to frequently scramble, leading the team in carries and scrimmage yards, underscoring his heavy reliance and increased personal risk due to insufficient offensive support. These issues contribute to the Chiefs' concerning recent form, having won only one of their last seven games, including a 24-17 defeat by the Denver Broncos.

In stark contrast, the Eagles boast a formidable roster featuring offensive weapons like Jalen Hurts, Saquon Barkley, and AJ Brown, presenting a tough defensive challenge, particularly against the run. The Chiefs also face a demanding upcoming schedule with games against the Giants and Ravens, potentially leading to a 1-3 record after four weeks.

Despite efforts to bolster their offensive line with draftees Josh Simmons and Jaylon Moore, the Chiefs' struggles are exacerbated by the competitiveness of the AFC West, where rivals like the Chargers, Raiders, and Broncos have significantly improved. While the Chiefs may be looking for revenge, their current form, coupled with injuries and a tough schedule, raises significant concerns about their playoff aspirations if these issues are not swiftly addressed.
summary_tgt:
इस सप्ताह के एनएफएल (NFL) शेड्यूल में कई अहम सुपर बाउल रीमैच शामिल हैं, खासकर बफ़ेलो बिल्स (Buffalo Bills) का सामना पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स (Pittsburgh Steelers) से होगा, जिन्होंने पिछले साल 24-21 से सुपर बाउल मुकाबला जीता था। हालाँकि, रविवार को कैनसस सिटी चीफ़्स (Kansas City Chiefs) और फिलाडेल्फिया ईगल्स (Philadelphia Eagles) के बीच होने वाले मैच पर सबकी नज़र है। यह चीफ़्स के लिए 2010 में ईगल्स से 40-22 की सुपर बाउल हार का बदला लेने का मौका है।

चीफ़्स इस मुकाबले में कई अहम चुनौतियों का सामना कर रहे हैं, जिसका मुख्य कारण क्वार्टरबैक पैट्रिक महोम्स (Patrick Mahomes) के लिए आक्रमण (offensive) सहयोगी खिलाड़ियों की कमी है। मुख्य रिसीवर राशी राइस (Rashee Rice) को छह मैचों के लिए निलंबित कर दिया गया है, और ज़ेवियर वर्थी (Xavier Worthy) कंधे की चोट के कारण बाहर हैं, जिससे हॉलीवुड ब्राउन (Hollywood Brown) और जूजू स्मिथ-शुस्टर (JuJu Smith-Schuster) जैसे भरोसेमंद लक्ष्य (targets) बहुत सीमित बचे हैं। इसके अलावा, उनकी रनिंग गेम (running game) भी संघर्ष कर रही है, जैसा कि लॉस एंजिल्स चार्जर्स (Los Angeles Chargers) के खिलाफ उनकी हालिया हार में इसाया पेचेको (Isiah Pacheco) और करीम हंट (Kareem Hunt) के 10 कैरी पर संयुक्त 41 गज से स्पष्ट होता है।

चार्जर्स के खिलाफ उस मैच में—जो 2002 के बाद चार्जर्स के खिलाफ चीफ़्स की पहली जीत थी—महोम्स को अक्सर दौड़ना पड़ा (scramble), जिससे वह टीम में सबसे ज़्यादा कैरी (carries) और स्क्रिमेज यार्ड (scrimmage yards) बनाने वाले खिलाड़ी बन गए। यह अपर्याप्त आक्रमण समर्थन के कारण उन पर अत्यधिक निर्भरता और उनके व्यक्तिगत जोखिम में वृद्धि को रेखांकित करता है। ये मुद्दे चीफ़्स की हालिया चिंताजनक फॉर्म में योगदान करते हैं, जिन्होंने अपने पिछले सात मैचों में से केवल एक जीता है, जिसमें डेनवर ब्रोंकोस (Denver Broncos) से 24-17 की हार भी शामिल है।

इसके बिल्कुल विपरीत, ईगल्स के पास जालेन हर्ट्स (Jalen Hurts), साक्वन बार्कले (Saquon Barkley) और एजे ब्राउन (AJ Brown) जैसे आक्रमणकारी हथियारों (offensive weapons) से लैस एक formidable roster है, जो एक कठिन रक्षात्मक चुनौती पेश करता है, खासकर रन गेम के खिलाफ। चीफ़्स को आगे एक मुश्किल शेड्यूल का भी सामना करना है, जिसमें जायंट्स (Giants) और रेवेन्स (Ravens) के खिलाफ मैच हैं, जिससे चार सप्ताह के बाद उनका रिकॉर्ड संभावित रूप से 1-3 हो सकता है।

ड्राफ्टी जोश सिमंस (Josh Simmons) और जेयलन मूर (Jaylon Moore) के साथ अपनी आक्रमण पंक्ति (offensive line) को मजबूत करने के प्रयासों के बावजूद, चीफ़्स की मुश्किलें एएफसी वेस्ट (AFC West) की प्रतिस्पर्धात्मकता से और बढ़ गई हैं, जहाँ चार्जर्स (Chargers), रेडर्स (Raiders) और ब्रोंकोस (Broncos) जैसे प्रतिद्वंदियों ने काफी सुधार किया है। जहाँ चीफ़्स बदला लेने की फिराक में हो सकते हैं, वहीं उनकी वर्तमान फॉर्म, चोटों और एक कठिन शेड्यूल के कारण उनकी प्लेऑफ़ (playoff) आकांक्षाओं (aspirations) को लेकर गंभीर चिंताएँ पैदा होती हैं, यदि इन मुद्दों को तुरंत हल नहीं किया गया।
meta_description: BBC Sport columnist Phoebe Schecter explains why she struggles to see the Kansas City Chiefs winning their Super Bowl rematch with the Philadelphia Eagles in week two of the NFL season.

title_src: Long throws are back - and Brentford are the masters of them
text_src: The long throw is back in vogue, it seems. It was a tactical weapon Rory Delap used to shake up the Premier League after Stoke's arrival in 2008 - causing havoc by launching the ball into the box. And now it is happening more and more in the top flight, with Brentford proving to be the masters of it. Against Chelsea on Saturday, Fabio Carvalho scored a late goal following a Kevin Schade long throw to secure a 2-2 draw. That was the last of a glut of long throws during the game from first Michael Kayode and then Schade. Earlier on, Chelsea keeper Robert Sanchez had tipped a Schade long throw over the bar even though nobody had appeared to touch it on the way through. It is the seventh goal that the Bees have scored from long throws since the start of last season, five more than other Premier League team. It might not be pretty, but it is effective. "I felt there's a little bit of snobbery in the game around scenarios like that," said Brentford boss Keith Andrews. "If the big boys do it, then it seems to be accepted." Asked how to avoid conceding goals from long throws, Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca said: "First of all, try not to concede the throw-in. "They have Kayode, Jensen, Schade and even Pinnock who are strong on throw-ins." BBC Match of the Day pundit Ashley Williams, the former Wales captain, said: "It's weirdly difficult [to defend long throws]. "The day before a game you practise defending corners and free-kicks but not long throws. "Because it's coming in from a different angle, it creates chaos. It's something teams should work on more." Former Republic of Ireland goalkeeper Shay Given added: "It's refreshing. Sometimes a bit of old school 'throw it into the mixer' can cause a bit of carnage."
summary_src:
The long throw is experiencing a significant resurgence in football, once again becoming a potent tactical weapon, particularly in the top flight. The tactic, which recalls Rory Delap's disruptive throws for Stoke, is now being mastered by teams like Brentford.

Brentford recently showcased its effectiveness against Chelsea, where Fabio Carvalho scored a late goal from a Kevin Schade long throw, securing a 2-2 draw following multiple dangerous throws throughout the game from Schade and Michael Kayode. This goal was one of seven Brentford has scored from long throws since the start of last season – five more than any other Premier League team – highlighting its effectiveness despite being viewed by some as "not pretty."

Brentford boss Keith Andrews acknowledged a "snobbery" surrounding the tactic, suggesting it receives more acceptance when employed by "big boys." Opponents, such as Chelsea, now acknowledge the threat, with manager Stuart Pearce specifically naming Brentford's key throwers like Kayode, Jensen, Schade, and Ethan Pinnock.

Pundits like Ashley Williams explain the defensive challenge, calling it "weirdly difficult" because the different angle creates "chaos," compounded by a lack of specific practice compared to defending corners and free-kicks. Former Republic of Ireland goalkeeper Shay Given called the tactic "refreshing," advocating for teams to improve their defense against this "old school 'throw it into the mixer'" approach that causes significant disruption.
summary_tgt:
फुटबॉल में लंबी थ्रो की जोरदार वापसी हो रही है, और यह एक बार फिर एक शक्तिशाली रणनीतिक हथियार बन गई है, खासकर शीर्ष स्तरीय लीग में। यह रणनीति, जो स्टोक के लिए रॉरी डेलैप के विध्वंसक थ्रो की याद दिलाती है, अब ब्रेंटफोर्ड जैसी टीमों द्वारा अपनाई जा रही है।

ब्रेंटफोर्ड ने हाल ही में चेल्सी के खिलाफ इसकी प्रभावशीलता का प्रदर्शन किया, जहां केविन शादे के एक लंबी थ्रो से फैबियो कार्वाल्हो ने देर से गोल कर मैच 2-2 से ड्रॉ करा दिया। पूरे मैच में शादे और माइकल कायोड के कई खतरनाक थ्रो देखने को मिले थे। यह गोल पिछले सीज़न की शुरुआत से ब्रेंटफोर्ड द्वारा लंबी थ्रो से किए गए सात गोलों में से एक था – जो किसी भी अन्य प्रीमियर लीग टीम से पांच अधिक हैं – और यह इसकी प्रभावशीलता को उजागर करता है, भले ही कुछ लोग इसे "आकर्षक नहीं" मानते हों।

ब्रेंटफोर्ड के बॉस कीथ एंड्रयूज ने इस रणनीति को लेकर एक "अभिजात्यवाद" (snobbery) की बात स्वीकार की, उनका सुझाव है कि जब इसका उपयोग "बड़ी टीमों" द्वारा किया जाता है तो इसे अधिक स्वीकार्यता मिलती है। चेल्सी जैसे विरोधी अब इस खतरे को स्वीकार करते हैं, और मैनेजर स्टुअर्ट पियर्स ने ब्रेंटफोर्ड के प्रमुख थ्रो करने वाले खिलाड़ियों – कायोड, जेनसेन, शादे और एथन पिनॉक – का विशेष रूप से नाम लिया।

एशले विलियम्स जैसे विशेषज्ञों ने रक्षात्मक चुनौती की व्याख्या करते हुए इसे "अजीबोगरीब मुश्किल" बताया है, क्योंकि इसका अलग कोण "उथल-पुथल" पैदा करता है, और कॉर्नर व फ्री-किक का बचाव करने की तुलना में इसके लिए विशिष्ट अभ्यास की कमी इसे और जटिल बना देती है। आयरलैंड गणराज्य के पूर्व गोलकीपर शे गिवन ने इस रणनीति को "ताजगी भरा" बताया और टीमों से इस "पुराने ढर्रे के 'भीड़ में गेंद फेंकने' वाले" तरीके के खिलाफ अपनी रक्षा को बेहतर बनाने की वकालत की, जो महत्वपूर्ण व्यवधान पैदा करता है।
meta_description: Brentford are the masters of the long throw and it showed again with their late equaliser against Chelsea on Saturday.

author: ['Shamoon Hafez']
title_src: Man City v Man Utd: What issues does Pep Guardiola need to fix?
text_src: There has been real confusion around the goalkeeping situation at City this summer too. Speaking in June, Guardiola said the two keepers they have - Ederson and Stefan Ortega - "will continue", with both going on to play at the Club World Cup in the USA. Having not seemingly been in the market for a new keeper, City then ended up signing three. Marcus Bettinelli was brought in to cover the departure of Carson, while City had matching rights on Newcastle's £27m bid for Burnley's James Trafford, and the club felt the prospect of re-signing the Englishman was too good to turn down. Ederson, meanwhile, went from being declared Guardiola's number one, external before the opening Premier League game against Wolves to being shipped off to Fenerbahce a mere 18 days later. In came Gianluigi Donnarumma from Paris St-Germain on deadline day after the Italy number one was brutally axed by Luis Enrique, despite helping the club to the Treble last season. Despite being deemed surplus to requirements, Ortega remains at the Etihad too, having turned down options to leave, meaning Guardiola has four first-team keepers on the books. "A lot of people didn't really understand the true value of Ederson because his shot-stopping is great, but his ability to get on the ball and to be the spare player that can create something," former City defender Nedum Onuoha told BBC's Football Focus. "Now he's gone, the people who are trying to fill those boots won't be able to do it in the same way. "From a City perspective, if their goalkeeper continues to get pressed and make those sorts of errors, it will encourage the opposition and change how City play." It is hard to envisage Donnarumma being signed to sit on the bench, which leaves Trafford in a situation where he thought he was coming in as the long-term heir to Ederson, but instead playing second fiddle to the towering Italian. Despite being only 26, Donnarumma brings vast experience as an elite, match-winning keeper with incredible shot-stopping ability, and he now has the opportunity to showcase his talents in England. "He is so tall; he is so huge," Guardiola said. "[From] all the keepers we want safe balls, give confidence to the team, have personality and a big presence. "In the biggest stages in the Champions League last season, at Villa Park, Anfield and in many games, he proved how good he is." With United also experiencing difficulties in between the sticks, they signed Belgian Sanne Lammens on deadline day, but Amorim confirmed Altay Bayindir will start in goal on Sunday.
summary_src:
This summer has seen considerable confusion surrounding the goalkeeping situation at "City." Despite manager Pep Guardiola stating in June that Ederson and Ortega would continue, the club subsequently made surprising moves, signing three new goalkeepers after not seemingly being in the market.

In a major twist, first-choice keeper Ederson, initially declared Guardiola's number one, was unexpectedly shipped off to Fenerbahce just 18 days later. Former City defender Nedum Onuoha lamented Ederson's departure, highlighting his unique value for both shot-stopping and his ability on the ball, suggesting his replacements would struggle to replicate his style, potentially encouraging opposition pressure and altering City's play.

Meanwhile, Italy's number one, Gianluigi Donnarumma, appears to have joined City, despite earlier reports linking him to PSG on transfer deadline day. He is not expected to sit on the bench, with Guardiola praising his "huge" stature and "big presence" as a keeper who provides "safe balls, confidence, personality." Donnarumma brings vast experience and elite shot-stopping, with Liverpool boss Brendan Rodgers also commending his Champions League performances.

James Trafford, for whom City had matching rights after a £27m bid from Newcastle, initially believed he was the long-term heir to Ederson but now finds himself playing "second fiddle" to Donnarumma. Marcus Bettinelli was also brought in to cover a departure, and despite being deemed surplus to requirements, Ortega remains at the Etihad, contributing to Guardiola reportedly having "four first-team keepers on the books."

The article also briefly notes goalkeeping difficulties at Manchester United, with Altay Bayindir set to start and Sanne Lammens joining on deadline day.
summary_tgt:
**इस गर्मी में "सिटी" में गोलकीपिंग की स्थिति को लेकर काफी भ्रम देखा गया है। जून में प्रबंधक पेप गार्डियोला ने कहा था कि एडरसन और ओर्टेगा बने रहेंगे, इसके बावजूद क्लब ने बाद में चौंकाने वाले कदम उठाए। ऐसा लग रहा था कि वे बाजार में सक्रिय नहीं हैं, फिर भी तीन नए गोलकीपरों को साइन किया गया।**

एक बड़े मोड़ के रूप में, पहले नंबर के गोलकीपर एडरसन, जिन्हें शुरुआत में गार्डियोला का नंबर वन घोषित किया गया था, केवल 18 दिनों के बाद अप्रत्याशित रूप से फेनरबाचे भेज दिए गए। सिटी के पूर्व डिफेंडर नेदुम ओनुओहा ने एडरसन के जाने पर अफ़सोस जताया। उन्होंने शॉट रोकने और गेंद पर उनकी क्षमता दोनों के लिए उनके अनूठे मूल्य पर प्रकाश डाला, यह सुझाव देते हुए कि उनके प्रतिस्थापन उनकी शैली को दोहराने के लिए संघर्ष करेंगे, जिससे संभवतः विपक्षी टीमों का दबाव बढ़ेगा और सिटी के खेल में बदलाव आएगा।

इस बीच, इटली के नंबर वन, जियानलुइगी डोनारुम्मा, ट्रांसफर डेडलाइन के दिन उन्हें पीएसजी से जोड़ने वाली शुरुआती रिपोर्टों के बावजूद, सिटी में शामिल हो गए लगते हैं। उनके बेंच पर बैठने की उम्मीद नहीं है, गार्डियोला ने उनकी "विशाल" कद-काठी और "बड़ी उपस्थिति" की प्रशंसा करते हुए कहा कि वह एक ऐसे कीपर हैं जो "सुरक्षित गेंदें, आत्मविश्वास और व्यक्तित्व" प्रदान करते हैं। डोनारुम्मा व्यापक अनुभव और बेहतरीन शॉट-स्टॉपिंग क्षमता लाते हैं, लिवरपूल के बॉस ब्रेंडन रॉजर्स ने भी उनके चैंपियंस लीग प्रदर्शन की सराहना की।

जेम्स ट्रैफर्ड, जिनके लिए न्यूकैसल से £27 मिलियन की बोली के बाद सिटी के पास मैचिंग राइट्स थे, शुरुआत में मानते थे कि वह एडरसन के दीर्घकालिक उत्तराधिकारी हैं, लेकिन अब खुद को डोनारुम्मा के 'दूसरे नंबर' पर पाते हैं। मार्केस बेटिनेली को भी एक और खिलाड़ी के जाने की भरपाई के लिए लाया गया था, और जरूरत से ज़्यादा माने जाने के बावजूद, ओर्टेगा एतिहाद में बने हुए हैं, जिससे रिपोर्ट्स के अनुसार गार्डियोला के पास "चार फर्स्ट-टीम गोलकीपर" हो गए हैं।

लेख में मैनचेस्टर यूनाइटेड में गोलकीपिंग की कठिनाइयों का भी संक्षेप में उल्लेख किया गया है, जिसमें अल्टे बेइंदिर शुरुआत करने के लिए तैयार हैं और सने लामेंस डेडलाइन के दिन टीम में शामिल हुए हैं।
